title: NeuroNation - Brain Training & Brain Games
description:
üèÜ Awarded with the Google 'Best Apps' prize! üèÜ

With NeuroNation personalized brain training, you elevate your brain day by day. Whether it's weaker memory, dwindling concentration or thinking too slowly - only 15 minutes of training a day can make problems disappear and give your brain new momentum. Join the worldwide community of over 15 million members and treat yourself to a piece of science - right in your pocket.

Why doing brain training with Neuronation? 
- OUTSTANDING EFFECTIVENESS: NeuroNation's brain training has been awarded the AOK Leonardo Health Prize for Digital Prevention sponsored by the German Federal Ministry of Health. 

- DIFFERENT EFFECTS: Various studies have repeatedly proven this: With brain training, you can improve your memory, noticeably reduce stress and the resulting risk of depression, increase your thinking speed and concentration and even reduce the risk of dementia by up to 48%.

- PERSONALIZATION: NeuroNation performs a comprehensive analysis of your strengths and potentials and creates a personal training plan for you that exactly meets your needs.

- CHANGE AND BALANCE: With 17 exercises on 250 levels you get a varied and motivating training for a balanced promotion of your brain.

- SCIENTIFIC BASIS: In a study conducted by NeuroNation together with the Department of General Psychology at Freie Universit√§t Berlin, the effectiveness of NeuroNation memory training was proven.

- DETAILED PROGRESS ANALYSIS: Thanks to many years of experience and many millions of users, we can give you the opportunity to follow your progress closely and interpret it correctly according to your comparison group.

- FUN AND MOTIVATION: Get together with friends, compare your results, train for a race and blast the old boundaries of your brain together.

- AND MUCH MORE: Already 15,000,000 members worldwide train your brain with NeuroNation. Join our community and convince yourself of the brain training of the latest generation. 

NEURONATION PREMIUM
- Comprehensive training program with 17 motivating exercises and many more to come
- Full personalization according to your wishes, strengths and potentials
- Regular publication of new exercises and courses
- Comprehensive customer support and quick help with questions

Download the app now and stay fit - for the rest of your life!

VISIT US: www.neuronation.com
FOLLOW US: twitter.com/neuronation
BE OUR FAN: facebook.com/neuronation

recentChanges:
Dear NeuroNation users,

thank you very much for your feedback! We are currently focusing on increasing app stability and publishing the next exercise. With this update the app stability should be increased first.

Over the next weeks and months we'll continue to improve the app. Please write us what you think:
bt-feedback@neuronation.com

Stay fit!
Your NeuroNation Team
comments: Good. Ads are so minimal on the free version which is refreshing. Sometimes I find the instructions don't make sense, so you have to pause and think. But I suppose that's good because we are training our brains to get better. I'm using this because I had a brain tumour removed and I'm trying to get my cognitive abilities back. Using this gives me a great sense of accomplishment, and benchmarks for areas of improvement

Great! Some problems/concerns: - time to read a task description should not be counted - better to not just choose a random exercises, but consider what a user was working on recently, cuz sometimes the app gives me the same one multiple times in a row - more statistics, please, so that I can track day to day progress - more exercises? Premium should help, but still

So as others have already stated...why does the timer countdown when you are reading how to do the different brain exercises. That is not fair at all. If I'm new and learning how to play them for the first time the timer shld not start....and you should have a 30-60second to learn how to play it before jumping right into the exercise. Other than that I love the exercises and I'll keep training my üß†.

Great little brain games that I'm hoping will really make a difference in my brain strength over time! Lol. Only 4 stars instead of 5 though because I could be doing better on the game's if we had more clear instructions for Each game provided to us. Like Examples of exactly how.to do each game would be Great! üëåüèΩüòÅ

Just what I needed! Beautifully designed app! I'm trying to improve my executive functioning because of what I think is the "COVID Long Haul" brain fog & forgetfullness. I also have ADHD & PTSD. This app is engaging like a game but not so addictive that it takes over my brain when I have something else I NEED to do. If it proves to have longer term benefits I will try to update this review. üòä

comments: Ok game. Way to many ads. Not sure how they get paid. BUT it seems if they get enough ads watched, before the game is uninstalled, they are happy. Because they must know its way to many and just dont care. This game is just to make a quick dollar.

Game really REALLY wants you to watch those ads. Some puzzles are easy to solve but won't work properly unless you get a hint first, which I let slide the first few times because I thought maybe I just wasn't doing the puzzles right, but it very quickly started to get annoying. Fun puzzles, for the most part, but more often than not are they more like questions you'd get on a school exam than fun little word problems to solve.

Got to the first one I needed a hint for, and used 25 points for a clue. All it tells me is that it's an easy one. Really? Upsides: There weren't many ads. Downsides: Other than the main issue, the tricks aren't consistent in their logic when compared to a previous similar challenge, like something having to do with size may have similar wording using different logic.

I tried playing the game but it was not as great and i had trouble opening the refrigerator on the second level I hope you can fix that please. But it was a great game needs some fixing but I recommend it if you are tired of games that don't make sense . But great game. But needs alot more levels I know some six year olds that have no trouble playing this and it is not that complicated . But no hate

I feel like this game was okay. Overall there were a bunch of ads but the game was pretty easy. I only skipped a few and even the 4 year old kid I was babysitting could complete some levels. It only took like 2 weeks to finish the whole game but I'm giving it 3 stars because they need to add more levels and less ads!!!

title: Brain Wars
description:
‚óá‚óÜThe World's First Real-Time Concentration Battling App!‚óÜ‚óá

Increase your brain power and compete against players from around the world!
Experience the heated battle that will keep you on your toes! 
Highly rated by players who enjoy Puzzles Crosswords, Sudoku, and other brain teasers! 

‚ñºThe Rules
„ÉªOutscore your opponents with simple brain teasers!
„ÉªDefeat them and climb the worldwide rankings!
„ÉªChallenge your friends with real-time matches!
„ÉªIncrease your Brain Power through continuous challenges!

‚óÜReal-Time Battle Experience
Compete with worldwide challengers‚ÄïLIVE! Test your opponents and push your brain to its limit!

‚óÜPlay With Friends! 
Invite your friends for double the fun! Connect through Facebook and challenge other players! 

‚óÜStrive For World-class Rankings

Brain Teasers don't contain certain subjects or languages! Train your brain and easily adapt through repetition!  

‚óÜNew and Updates
„ÉªOfficial FaceBook Page

„ÉªOfficial Twitter

BrainWars is a mental concentration battle game for players from around the world. Players can participate in this through simple brain teasers and compete with each other. Brain Teasers do not require special knowledge so everyone can improve their brain function through repetition and adaptation.

title: Brain Wash - Amazing Jigsaw Thinking Game
description:
How often do you talk to your brain?
 
Hey, friend, what's up! It's me, your crazy brain! üß† Let's chat a little, I have a surprise for you‚Ä¶ If you're brave enough, ask yourself three simple questions:

1. Are you tired of following the rules? 

Good job. Next one, please.

2. Want fresh ideas and unique insights?

 And last but not least:

3. Do you know how to start thinking in a different and unique way?
You probably failed just now. But don't worry! I know the right solution, 'cause you can't imagine how sick I am of stereotypical thinking! 

How about we wash ourselves?

Oh, no-no-no! I don't need all your private details‚Ä¶ But have you ever washed me? ü§î I'm talking about the puzzle game Brainwash! It's a creative way to make me feel special and free from ordinary framework!

This unusual jigsaw üß© is a magical tool that will help us think differently and solve fun, unpredictable tasks. Let me catch your interest by mentioning some of them:

- match a cat and its owner or make a firework
- find a lion or even some cookies
- help a prisoner escape or identify a baby's father
- fix a cassette tape or draw the leaning tower of Pisa
- turn "lose" into "love" or feed an alien cat
 
Why should you give Brain Wash a shot?

Top 5 key reasons: 

1. It has nothing in common with old-school puzzle games.
2. You won't be bored! 100 varied and interesting levels.
3. It doesn't take up a lot of your time ‚Äì you'll only need about 1 minute for each level.
4. User-friendly interface: easy to understand and grasp the concept.
5. Stylish game tools and cheerful motivation as you play.

So what should you do now?

‚öà Download the game: choose the best online store for your device (Keep in mind! There are only two possible options). Do it, I'm watching you!
‚öà Turn on your logic. We need to be running at the max to excel!
‚öà Press the button and get ready for some action!
Are there any instructions for this puzzle game? No! Time to leave guides behind!

Ready, set, wash your brain!

- help a prisoner escape or identify a baby's father
- fix a cassette tape or draw the leaning tower of Pisa
- turn "lose" into "love" or feed an alien cat

Why should you give Brain Wash a shot?

Top 5 key reasons:

1. It has nothing in common with old-school puzzle games.
2. You won't be bored! 100 varied and interesting levels.
3. It doesn't take up a lot of your time ‚Äì you'll only need about 1 minute for each level.
4. User-friendly interface: easy to understand and grasp the concept.
5. Stylish game tools and cheerful motivation as you play.

So what should you do now?

‚öà Download the game: choose the best online store for your device (Keep in mind! There are only two possible options). Do it, I'm watching you!
‚öà Turn on your logic. We need to be running at the max to excel!
‚öà Press the button and get ready for some action!
Are there any instructions for this puzzle game? No! Time to leave guides behind!

Ready, set, wash your brain!

title: Peak ‚Äì Brain Games & Training
description:
Peak is the fun, free brain training workout designed around you. Peak uses brain games and puzzles to challenge memory, language and critical thinking to keep your mind active. 

With brain games made in partnership with academics from leading universities like Cambridge and NYU, and more than 12m downloads, Peak is a fun, challenging brain training experience.

It takes just 10 minutes a day to complete a brain training workout. And, with 45 brain games for adults, and new brain training workouts every day, there is always a fun challenge waiting for you.


KEY FEATURES
 
- Free brain games to challenge your Memory, Attention, Math, Problem Solving, Mental Agility, Language, Coordination, Creativity and Emotion Control.
- Learn which categories your brain excels in, and compete with friends by comparing your brainmap and brain game performance.
- Coach, the personal trainer for your brain, helps you track your progress and improve.
- Cognitive brain training with games from expert researchers at Cambridge University, NYU and more.
- Works offline so you can enjoy Peak brain games wherever you are.
- Selected by Google as Editor's Choice.
- More than 45 brain games available and regular updates to keep you challenged. 
- Get personalised brain training workouts and in-depth insights with Peak Pro.
- Get access to Peak Advanced Training modules: intensive programs that train a specific skill, including the new Wizard memory game created with Professor Barbara Sahakian and Tom Piercy in the Department of Psychiatry at the University of Cambridge.
 

IN THE NEWS

‚ÄúIts mini games focus on memory and attention, with strong detail in its feedback on your performance.‚Äù - The Guardian

‚ÄúImpressed with graphs in Peak that let you see your performance over time.‚Äù - The Wall Street Journal

‚ÄúThe Peak app is designed to provide each user with a profound level of insight into their current state of cognitive function.‚Äù - Techworld


DEVELOPED BY NEUROSCIENTISTS
 
Designed in collaboration with experts in neuroscience, cognitive science and education, Peak makes brain training fun and rewarding. Peak's scientific advisory board includes Professor Barbara Sahakian FMedSci DSc, Professor of Clinical Neuropsychology at the University of Cambridge.

recentChanges: Your brain is unique and that‚Äôs why Coach creates personal workouts just for you. But we all have specific skills we want to challenge and so we‚Äôre introducing Workout Selection. You can select from a range of workouts, each one specially created for you. Interested in language? Try our language workout! Only have 5 minutes to train? comments: It's a solid app with a lot of challenges. Some of them pretty simple and common, other instead are very difficult, I love this balance. I used to play Elevate last year and I decided to change for something different, however there are few games (especially math ones) that I wish to have here as well! Hoping to see some new game in the future (:

The games on here are very good and I enjoyed playing them. Whether they actually do anything for your brain or whether you simply get better at playing them is an interesting and ongoing question! My only criticism is that the language is very american-based and so can be quite challenging if you are UK English speaking because you don't understand what object you should be looking for for example in the find the object game. Overall excellent.

First few weeks things were good, . Now my R√†ting has gone from 4 to 2. I have free version and am supposed to watch videos. Yeh, right! I push play and screens says "loading video" but it Never does. After 30 sec, I get bumped back to play screen, very boring ! If I was not a bed ridden senior citizen w/covid complications, it would not bother me so badly. I rebooted my ph & reinstalled your app too many, times~NO change. I enjoyed what little I saw of Peak. Hasta la vista !

I like the app. It brings me a lot of mental challenges, that are quite interesting. It really increases our IQ. The only problem I am facing is performance. Whenever a game starts or even in the middle of the same, it stutters and freezes, randomly. It doesn't occur often, but it disturbs, especially on timing challenges. OTT, the app is look good üôÇüëçüèª

Honestly, I never leave reviews, but I really do love this app! I paid for all the content and most of the time when I buy in app purchases for more content, I am left pretty bored and dissatisfied, but Peak is the only app so far that hasn't left me feeling like that! So thank you, and I really enjoy training daily to get me into the zone for using my mind for the rest of the day, as well as being able to see the progress I am making compared to other people within my age group.

title: General Knowledge Quiz
description:
At what level do you think your general knowledge is? ü§î Here's a fun way to find out! DOWNLOAD GENERAL KNOWLEDGE QUIZ, ANSWER GK QUIZ QUESTIONS and discover how much you really know about the world that surrounds you. One of the cutest trivia games and general knowledge games awaits!

This GK quiz contains a bunch of trivia questions and answers from different categories and fun facts for every single quiz question you answer. Whether it's geography quiz, history trivia game or sports quiz questions that you prefer - this GK quiz trivia game includes all of them stack into one unique general knowledge game. One thing is for sure: you won't get bored answering those quick trivia questions. So, download General Knowledge Quiz trivia game and show the world that knowing random things can be fun and useful!

GENERAL KNOWLEDGE QUIZ FEATURES

Fun quick quizzes in general are a nice way to have a good time and learn something new. With a possibility to answer quick quiz questions in all the languages you know, this GK quiz is one of the most interesting general knowledge games than ever! So get General Knowledge Quiz game and enjoy learning new stuff through quick trivia questions and answers!

One thing is for sure: you won't get bored answering those quick trivia questions. Some of us might find this general knowledge quiz easy, some hard, but we will all have a good time with this brain teaser. So, download General Knowledge Quiz trivia game and show the world that knowing random things can be fun and useful!

GENERAL KNOWLEDGE QUIZ FEATURES

- GK QUIZ IN 16 DIFFERENT LANGUAGES: Arabic, Bulgarian, Chinese, Croatian, English, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Korean, Japanese and Thai
- HINTS - if you get stuck on a certain question, hint can be of help OR you can
- SKIP QUESTION, lose one life and move to the next trivia question
- HEARTS are your lives, each incorrect answer is one heart less
- ASK A FRIEND for help if you run out of all hints
- CERTIFICATE - you get it once you answer all trivia quiz questions

Fun quick quizzes in general are a nice way to have a good time and learn something new. With so many trivia questions and answers + fun facts for each one of them, this general knowledge quiz is a must-have among the apps. With a possibility to answer quick quiz questions in all the languages you know, this GK quiz is one of the most interesting general knowledge games than ever! So get General Knowledge Quiz game and enjoy learning new stuff through quick trivia questions and answers!

LEGAL INFO

Images used in General Knowledge Quiz are under Public Domain or Creative Commons License. For more info, please visit the About App section within the app itself.

General Knowledge Quiz is an intellectual property of Quizzes by Peaksel.
summary: Play General Knowledge Quiz & find out how much you know in this GK quiz game!
comments: Very challenging and interesting general knowledge quiz.
too many ads
Pretty challenging and educational
Very helpful app

Nice, but limit on Playing turn is bad. I just downloaded it and play it for about 15 minutes. Then, i can't play further, because it requires heart to play. and... How to get heart? The simplest answers is to watch ads. Well, the player will lose heart if he gets the wrong answer. But the objective to play, at least for me, is to extend my general knowledge. I feel disappointed in this system, although the apps game play is nice.

title: Brain It On! - Physics Puzzles
description:
Deceptively challenging physics puzzles for your brain!

Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles. They're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?

‚óÜ Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time
‚óÜ Compete with your friends for the Brain It On! crown
‚óÜ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
‚óÜ Share your unique solutions and compare with your friends

All the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous levels. You can always find dozens of new player created free levels each day on the community screen. You can also purchase the game to remove all ads, unlock all hints, unlock levels early, and unlock the level editor.

Please note: purchasing the "No Popup Ads" option just removes the ads between levels, purchasing the "Full Game" will also remove the ads to get hints.

If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at support@brainitongame.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.

You can find me on Twitter at @orbitalnine, see the latest news on the Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/brainitongame, or get all the details on the website: http://brainitongame.com

I hope you enjoy Brain It On!

recentChanges:
- Added a very hard difficulty levels tab on the community levels screen
- Added black borders to the hint shapes to help see overlapping shapes

comments: You will probably give up on some levels because you have no clue. Might even watch a hint still be unsure. Always room for improvement! It's rewarding when you figure it out. The physics overall work well, I had a few issues where the peices glitch through eachother. But it's rare and just requires a restart. No big deal. The levels start off easy, now I'm skipping some levels because I can't figure it out. If you want a challenge. Try this game. It's a lot of fun.

I love this game. Starting off drawing shapes to move balls around the screen, the game developes, becoming a balancing act of inginuity, precision and skill, without adding any additional mechanics. The level design is tight, teaching ideas organically, without becoming impossible, but hArd COrE GaMerS can enjoy trying over and over for full stars. The ads aren't infuriating, and although the objects can clip, it's rare enough to be funny, instead of infuriating.

"Gravity, to Copernicus, is the nostalgia of things to become spheres." - Annie Dillard ....... Sometimes an itch comes along that you just have to scratch. Impressed so far - still rather early in my experience of the game - but thinking a stylus would be quite helpful. Thanks to the developers.

It used to be an rxcellent brain trainer that fotces you to think outside the box. Now it's broken because it wants to force use of "Google Play Games" library to "enhance experience" with useless tie-in with farcebook and other useless social stuff. Uninstall as broken. I corrected, it wasn't "some games library" it's "Google Play Games". It forces me to the Google Play app to install it. I can provide screenshot.

I love it! It does not rush you, if you get it wrong you haven't wasted hours, only seconds.At the moment I feel educated, and with a greater appreciation for physical objects. On Premium you can delete it when you get angry, then reinstall months later unchanged, no penalty. You need a precision stylus if you use it on mobile phone (I must get one!) . The 'hints' and 'restart' buttons are badly placed for right handers, you can accidentally press them during play, I wish I could move them.

title: Math Exercises for the brain, Math Riddles, Puzzle
description:
Increase your brain power and compete against players from around the world!
Experience the heated battle that will keep you on your toes!

Free Math Games for everyone from kids to adults. Brain games is based on principles of cognitive psychology to help you practice different mental skills: memory, attention, speed, reaction, concentration, logic, mathematics, time tables and more math quiz. 

Fight with other people in math game in multiplayer Arena in real time! 

"Quick Brain" - it is a Puzzle game with many levels and multiplayer:

- True / False mathematics game
- Mathematics Balance
- Schulte table
- Multiplayer Arena with leaderboards. You can fight with your friends in real time!

For all ages: games for kids, for parents and for everybody!

The main advantages:
- quick developing of memory and attention for children and adults
- efficient training of the brain
- simple and understandable process of playing
- game is available without Internet connection
- app doesn‚Äôt spend much time
- number sense

The application will be useful for all ages:
- students and kids - to master the basics of mathematics and arithmetic, learn multiplication table, prepare for math tests and exams

- 2048 puzzle game

title: Math Master - Brain Quizzes & Math Puzzles
description:
Are you searching for a math quiz game for your kids to practice basic math operations? Or you are searching for an app that offers mathematical, general aptitude, reasoning and logical puzzles to speed up your calculation skills for your next competitive exam? Or you are a math expert searching for a brain game to give your brain a workout? You've come to the right place! Math Master is a free math quiz app offering a great set of challenging math quizzes and various math tricks to improve your mental math.

Math Master can be a great source of learning for your kids studying in kindergarten, preschool or elementary School. For high school students or college graduates, it can be a math practice tool to crack competitive exams. It lets you play math quizzes of basic arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, division or statistics like average, mean, median or complex math concepts like sequence and series. Solve challenging math puzzles and be Math Master!
 
MATH MASTER APP FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Dedicated book for every mathematical operation
‚Ä¢ 10 chapters for each book with increasing difficulty
‚Ä¢ Unique math quizzes & puzzles
‚Ä¢ Create a profile to synchronize your game progress    	
‚Ä¢ Leaderboard to watch your standing in the world of Math Master
‚Ä¢ Mathematics tips & tricks
‚Ä¢ 5 quiz timer modes and other settings            	
‚Ä¢ Multilingual support 
‚Ä¢ It‚Äôs completely free and designed for all ages!
 
BOOK FOR EVERY MATHEMATICAL OPERATION
App offers a separate book for every mathematical operation. Simply tap the book and start playing! Available books are:
1. Addition
2. Subtraction
3. Multiplication
4. Division
5. Basic Random from 1 to 4 books
6. Average, mean and median
7. Power
8. Statistics
9. Smallest & Largest
10. Equations
11. Mixed (1-10)
12. Sequence and Series
13. Brain Quizzes 1 - Logical puzzles of Percentage, Simple or Coumpound Interest, Profit & Loss, Stock and Shares etc
14. Brain Quizzes 2 - Logical puzzles of Age, Calendar, Clock, Fractions and Logarithm etc
15. Brain Quizzes 3 - Logical puzzles of Average, Chain Rule, Time & Work, Time & Distance etc
16. Brain Quizzes 4 - Logical puzzles of Missing Number, Area & Volume, Permutation & Combination, Probability etc
 
10 CHAPTERS PER BOOK
Each book consists of 10 unique chapters with increasing difficulty levels. Start playing and raise your game score chapter by chapter.
 
UNIQUE MATH QUIZZES
Unique random math quizzes/puzzles will be presented to you depending upon difficulty level of chapter. You can flip or change one question per game.
 
MATH TIPS & TRICKS
Want to learn how to crack complex math quizzes to earn more points? Go through Tips & Tricks!
 
SETTINGS, MULTILINGUAL SUPPORT & MORE
Is it hard for you to finish game within limited time? No worries! We‚Äôve 5 quiz timer modes for you. Just go to Settings > Set Quiz Timer and set as per your math expertise. Also app offers multilingual support to let you explore app in your preferred language.
 
Visit us at: http://bemathmaster.com 
Like us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/bemathmaster 
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/bemathmaster 
Send Feedback: contact@bemathmaster.com 

Don't forget to Rate/Comment & Share!

13. Brain Quizzes 1 - Logical puzzles of Percentage, Simple or Coumpound Interest, Profit & Loss, Stock and Shares etc

15. Brain Quizzes 3 - Logical puzzles of Average, Chain Rule, Time & Work, Time & Distance etc
16. Brain Quizzes 4 - Logical puzzles of Missing Number, Area & Volume, Permutation & Combination, Probability etc

10 CHAPTERS PER BOOK
Each book consists of 10 unique chapters with increasing difficulty levels. Start playing and raise your game score chapter by chapter.

UNIQUE MATH QUIZZES
Unique random math quizzes/puzzles will be presented to you depending upon difficulty level of chapter. You can flip or change one question per game.

MATH TIPS & TRICKS
Want to learn how to crack complex math quizzes to earn more points? Go through Tips & Tricks!

SETTINGS, MULTILINGUAL SUPPORT & MORE
Is it hard for you to finish game within limited time? No worries! We‚Äôve 5 quiz timer modes for you. Just go to Settings > Set Quiz Timer and set as per your math expertise. Also app offers multilingual support to let you explore app in your preferred language.

title: Brain Bout - Quiz Game App - All Types of Question
description:
Brain Bout is a community quizzing platform that allows you to play during any time of the day without waiting for appointments. Questions will come to you as per the categories that you would have chosen during the time of sign up to make it extremely personalised. It is first such application that shows different questions to different appointments while maintaining the same difficulty level using artificial intelligence technology. This means you are playing to your strength always. You can change your categories for quizzing from ‚Äòmy account‚Äô.

There are separate boards for multiple tournaments organised during the day and apart from this an overall tally of all the competition across the categories covering all the appointments. Also, coming soon is ‚Äòmy account‚Äô to showcase daily points earned.

Rewards System (Coming soon).

An exciting reward system that will convert your scores into reward points . These reward points can be converted to vouchers of your choice. Not just you can make reward points by playing quiz but you can also earned by referring a friend from other organizations. Lot of bonus reward points can be earned by logging in with discipline and also by coming in top slots in daily Quizzes.

Contribute a question and earn - You will be able to earn reward points by submitting quiz questions. These can be pure text or text to the visual quiz questions. We will need a link to authenticate the hey question and post approvals by the content team, you will get rewards point in your account.

title: Total Brain
description:
Total Brain helps you understand and train all your brain capacities to improve your mental health and wellness.

Founded on the principle that our mental health can be measured, improved and managed like our physical health, Total Brain measures the 12 brain capacities that define your mental health and screens for the risk of common mental conditions. Then, based on that assessment, Total Brain provides you with specific mental fitness programs designed to strengthen your brain capacities and improve your mental health. 

Scientific, Simple and Convenient to Use:

Measure Monthly - Take our easy to use, 20 minute, confidential, clinically validated assessment.
Understand Totally - Get results showing 12 brain capacities that identify strengths/weaknesses and potential health risks.
Train Specifically ‚Äì Start a custom mental fitness program with digital brain exercises, breathing and meditation for just 15 minutes a day, then reassess and track progress.

Benefits:

Self-Awareness ‚Äì Learn about your strengths, weaknesses and risk of mental conditions
Effectiveness Monitoring ‚Äì Monitor the impact of mental fitness programs and treatment 
Confidentially Screen ‚Äì Screen for risk of common mental conditions and receive immediate, in-app referrals to third party health services 
Improved Performance1 ‚Äì Measurable improvement across each of the 12 brain capacities, yielding an improvement in overall mental health

[1] Improvements in brain performance correlated with average of three hours of training. 2017 internal book of business data; N = 3,275; Users who assessed + trained at least twice

recentChanges: Various bug fixes.
comments: Great app so far! One problem. You keep putting vulnerable as a negative emotion, and that isn't right. It feeds into a deep fear and stigma we should be trying to break down. You can't be brave, innovative, creative or a leader without vulnerability. It is not a negative, it is a necessity and asset. As someone going into the field of emotional research, I can tell you THAT is what the science says.

Downloaded app and was genuinely excited to get started. Went to Sign Up and was blocked by a message saying that sign ups are limited those with a company referral code. I now feel like that app had the opposite effect on my brain than what was intended. I can not a would not recommend this app.

This is a pretty good app that is continuously improving. There are still some bugs that need worked out, and I wish there was a system for reporting these. For example, the self-regulate exercise doesn't allow me to adjust the 1-10 scales. Also, the positive affirmations exercise never seems to complete, and I can never get progress points for it.

Well it's a really great app as far as I have seen, minus a few glitches, like being able to get to the button during the assessment to proceed to the next screen. But I have a different complaint! I was prompted to sign up and download and ultimately use the app, which I completed in entirety, yet I haven't been credited at all on the originating survey panel like I was promised to receive! It was through the survey panel named Attapoll for the amount of $1.04! Please resolve this!
App is neat, but after the last update, the games do not work properly for me. I can't play any games that require the player to "drag" anything.

title: Human Brain Everything To Know About
description:
This app provides in depth information about various parts of the brain.
The brain is an organ that serves as the center of the nervous system in all vertebrate and most invertebrate animals. The brain is located in the head, usually close to the sensory organs for senses such as vision. The brain is the most complex organ in a vertebrate's body. In a human, the cerebral cortex contains approximately 15‚Äì33 billion neurons, each connected by synapses to several thousand other neurons. These neurons communicate with one another by means of long protoplasmic fibers called axons, which carry trains of signal pulses called action potentials to distant parts of the brain or body targeting specific recipient cells.

Physiologically, the function of the brain is to exert centralized control over the other organs of the body. The brain acts on the rest of the body both by generating patterns of muscle activity and by driving the secretion of chemicals called hormones. This centralized control allows rapid and coordinated responses to changes in the environment. Some basic types of responsiveness such as reflexes can be mediated by the spinal cord or peripheral ganglia, but sophisticated purposeful control of behavior based on complex sensory input requires the information integrating capabilities of a centralized brain.

The operations of individual brain cells are now understood in considerable detail but the way they cooperate in ensembles of millions is yet to be solved. Recent models in modern neuroscience treat the brain as a biological computer, very different in mechanism from an electronic computer, but similar in the sense that it acquires information from the surrounding world, stores it, and processes it in a variety of way
**Content divided into chapters for better understanding

title: Big Brain - Functional Brain Training
description:
Big Brain - Free Funtional Brain Training is a compilation of 25 brain games inspired by daily life. Improve your cognitive skillz, test you brain and become smarter all while having fun with different brain puzzles. With 25 different brain games divided into 5 categories, both your left and right sides of your brain will be tested.  

These games are inspired by daily life and designed to improve skills you use every day: from finding a lost email to remember the name of your new colleague. They are organized in small and quick trainings that you can complete in 10 minutes or less. 

Choose a complete overall programm or one focused on your desired goals. Got 5 minutes for a coffee? Perfect, we have a training designed for you!

Measure your progress every day with detailed stats that will show you how you perform on each area. Feel how your mind elevates and reaches its mental peak.
Better than any IQ test game, Big Brain is like yoga for brain. Improve your memory, mental agility, logic skills, problem solving skills, calculation speed and much more.

Big Brain - Functional Brain Training¬¥s games are divided into 5 categories:

Calculate: different math problems will test your addition skills and speed
Identify: foster your selective attention and priorization skills
Analize: develop your mental flexibility and problem solving skills
Agility: think and react faster
Memorize: improve you memory, focus and attention abilities

Big Brain key features includes:
10 training programms depending on your goals and time availability
25 functional brain games inspired by daily life
Track and measure your progress: see how you improve on each mental area
Available in English, French and Spanish 

Big Brain offers a complete mental training; discover how smart you are and exercise your brain until you reach your mental peak.
Exercise your brain regularly and improve your memory, agility and logic skills

title: IQ Test: Measure Your IQ
description:
In this IQ test, we bring the best experience for our users who'd like to see their intelligence ranging from categories such as memory to emotional IQ! Intelligence is difficult to understand as there are different versions of intelligence that all people are trained at. Therefore, while calculating intelligence, it is important that IQ tests include different versions IQ examinations. The test-taker will see for him/herself what sort of intelligence he/she has. The IQ tests that are in this app are:

IQ tests that are in IQ Test: Measure your IQ
1) General IQ: 30 questions with 4 multiple choice answers. 
2) Emotional IQ: 40 questions with 2 multiple choice answers.
3) Logical IQ: 10 questions with 4 multiple choice answers.
4) Quantitative IQ: 10 questions with 4 multiple choice answers.
5) Memory Test: 10 amazing questions wit 4 multiple choice answers.

- Brain Teaser section: The brain teaser section is meant to train your intelligence! There are amazing questions in the brain teaser section that will improve your IQ. The objective is to get all of the tricky questions correctly so that you finish the brain teaser section! 

In the results section of each IQ test, you will see your IQ range, strengths, weaknesses, romantic types, celebrity types, and your secret self! IQ as a concept is very related to your character. Therefore, we have used a grading methodology that takes into account the sort of questions you get correctly and the ones you miss. 

At the home screen, you will be able to track your results in the results section. The results section shows your latest IQ score and the detailed IQ results. IQ test: Measure your IQ can also be considered as a Brain Test as the questions really is meant to calculate and improve your brain smartness. The brain is shaped by neurons that fire every single time you challenge them. Your IQ score is determined by how fast you could work your brain. With the brain teaser section, you will be able to train your brain. With the IQ tests, you will be able to calculate your individual IQ intelligence: emotional IQ to memory IQ. 

Important Note: IQ test: Measure your IQ is meant to be fun and educating experience for our users. It should not be taken too seriously as intelligence and IQ are concepts that to this day scientific world has difficulty in quantifying. 

Enjoy IQ test: measure your IQ!

title: The Professor: Brain Challenge
description:
After dizzying success in several countries around the world, The Professor is finally here!
Forget everything you know about word games, because the professor arrives and brings challenges that you've never seen before!

If you're ready for a big challenge, and feel like you have the ability to defeat the professor, then you've probably come to the right place.

Brain Training -
Be absolutely certain that The Professor, a fun Thinking Game, will go beyond your ordinary imagination and thinking skills and force you to think outside the box. Therefore, playing The Professor everyday, could be a great training for your brain, mind, language skills and a great solution for brain training.

The professor, combining various types of games scattered along a huge map contains of different countries which were designed with real territory lines and landmarks!
In order to proceed in the game, you'll have to face various intellectual challenges and upgrade the structures on each island.

Every stage has a different challenge, varying between Brain Teasers, Riddles, Trivia, Knowledge, General Knowledge, Crossword, Word-search, Wordsearch, Associations, Related Words and Proverbs.
You can also take part in the daily challenges, events and join our social community!

Top users will appear in our leaderboard, so give everything you have to lead it!

So... what do you say? Think you are good at mastering word games, challenges, puzzles and proverbs?
Come and prove that you have what it takes to defeat the professor!

I recommend Last Brain Standing to anyone that's a trivia buff.

title: What's my IQ? - Brain Booster
description:
If you always wondered about your intelligence quotient or looking for a super brain training app or super brain exercise app, you are in the right place because IQ Test - Brain Booster app is the best way to train your brain and your mind.

How smart are you? Do you know about IQ (Intelligence Quotient), it is a total score derived from several standardized tests designed to assess human intelligence

IQ of famous people:

- Stephen Hawking IQ 160
- Albert Einstein IQ 160 - 190
- Leonardo da Vinci IQ 180-190
- Wolfgang Mozart IQ 165
- Bill Gates IQ 160

IQ Test - Brain Booster app is almost like a general IQ test, MENSA test, Logical test, Intelligence test, psychometric test, or DAT test. It's good for you if you intend to take SHL or Kenexa coherent or inductive Reasoning Test or prepare to join the interview IQ Test.

To do this test you need to have observation, analysis, reasoning and calculation skills to give the right answer.

The test will help you to boost your brain improve your problem solving ability and brain sensitivity.

This IQ test app measures your fluid intelligence (Gf) ‚Äì your reasoning and problem solving ability.

The IQ Test comprises of 39 questions which in turn are gradually more complex. Respondents choose geometric shapes to properly complete larger images.

Take a quick IQ test to find out your IQ, just 40 minutes for 39 questions you will find out your IQ, you can test IQ and practice more times, we provide to you the different IQ test every moment.

The test measures only a subset of intellectual abilities. Based on this, valid conclusions can not be drawn about the overall intelligence of the person, the results are approximate.

Taking the IQ test and scoring is offline and the score is given free of charge(does not require internet connection).

title: Hangman ‚Äì Word Puzzle & Brain Exercise Games
description:
HANGMAN ‚Äì One of the most loved word puzzle games of all time! Classic Word puzzle & Vocabulary Game suitable for all ages with funny and entertaining Stick-man animations.


It‚Äôs time to wake up your BRAIN and Improve your vocabulary and general knowledge skills with thousands of word puzzles from numerous TOPICS like MOVIE, TV Series, History, Music, Food & drinks, Sports, Science and many more!

 
=== How to Play ===

1.	Guess the word based on HINT TOPIC showed in every puzzle.
2.	Use the keyboard to fill the blank spaces with the answer.
3.	Can use the vowels first to improve your chances of guessing the word.
4.	For each wrong guess, the hangman figure will be formed.
5.	Try and guess the word puzzle before the chances run out.
6.	Use the hint to help reveal letters & help take your game play to the next level.
7.	Solve the puzzle with lesser attempts to Earn higher brain score.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 CLICK ON SOLVED PUZZLE WORD TO LEARN MORE 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=== Features ===

- Thousands of puzzles to solve From various Topics.
- Learn more about solved puzzle word.
- Spin the Wheel & win free coins!
- PLAY WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY
- Daily bonus coins for free hints!
- Keeps your mind active.
- Great time killer.
- Challenge your brain and vocabulary
- Relaxing game-play with no time limit.


NEW WORD GAMES!
Feeling competitive? Test your skills with your friends in this new word games.
Fans of word games will have a blast solving each word puzzle with their friends!


RELAXING & CHALLENGING!
 A perfect relaxing diversion from day to day stress, Everyone has played HANGMAN on the white board, why not play it on your phone instead! This game is so much fun you can play it for hours.

PERFECT FUN FOR ENTIRE FAMILY!
This classic word puzzle game is entertaining and educational for all ages, as it test your vocabulary, Trivia & General knowledge skills  at the same time.
Hangman puzzles are handpicked from various fun categories.

NOTE:- 
- You can turn off the sound & vibration from settings menu.

title: General Biology Quiz Game Natural Science Quiz
description:
Learning has never been so fun and easy! Download General Biology Quiz Game Natural Science Quiz for free and start the most awesome smart quiz adventure ever! A variety of interesting and intelligent questions and answers on a variety of topics: from basic to advanced level biology, plant and animal cell biology to most complex human body parts biology structure. Answer GK questions on living things characteristics and have fun while you are learning. An amazing educational app for learning science biology terminology in an amusing way. Have fun with quizlet learning & revision that is so entertaining and helpful at the same time. A fantastic new education app 2020 and one of the latest new apps for GK education in bio science. You won't need any biology dictionary or textbook ‚Äì this fun trivia quiz will be your best study guide for any course or exam! One of the best quiz games general knowledge with trivia questions and answers for secondary school, high school and college students. Discover the fascinating world of biological science, molecular biology, animal and plant cells, cell organelles and the whole universe of new knowledge. The most amusing bio questions quiz that you can learn so much from - from basic cell structure to human anatomy and physiology and body systems.

‚ÄúGeneral Biology Quiz Game Natural Science Quiz‚Äù features:

* Time  - prolong your playing time as long as you give correct answers! Each correct answer means additional time and each wrong answers reduces your playing time.

An intelligent science quiz on all the fields of biology that you will adore!

The most useful learning app for kids and adults and the best quiz of knowledge 2020. Learn about fascinating biology experiments and find out all the interesting facts. This quiz contains 5 levels, each of increasing difficulty. You have a time limit to answer each question so you need to think fast! To unlock the next level, you must answer 20 questions correctly in a row. Can you unlock all 5 levels and beat the quiz to prove you are a genius?

You can enjoy this funny, tricky, challenging and addictive quiz IQ game with your friends or by yourself.

- Geography

- Food and drinks

title: Brain Base
description:
Brain Base combines the pillars of advocacy, education, and scholarship to promote accessibility to health information and resources. We connect brain injury survivors, families, and practitioners with the knowledge, skills, and strategies necessary for optimizing recovery and overall quality of life. Here we use technology as a platform to revolutionize the way that services are acquired, creating a mechanism that supports individuals in self-managing their care. Get access to different brain injury trainings and certifications, stay up-to-date on the latest brain injury research, explore treatment options and facilities and search vocational rehabilitation and employment information. 

Here are numerous brain injury resources, compiled into one user-friendly format and organized by category. Finding information has never been easier! 

 Brain Base Includes: 

-Information on insurance, understanding different government programs, and includes contact information and applications for Veterans Affairs Benefits, Medicare, and TennCare

-Over 30 different podcasts for survivors, families, and practitioners

-All of the vocational rehabilitation programs in Tennessee with contact information, organized by county 

-Information on a range of different services offered in Tennessee, to help survivors, family members, and Veterans from assistive technology to housing, advocacy, service animals & more

- Direct SMS and phone calls with different national and state-based lifelines and live chats for survivors and military personnel who are struggling with mental health disorders, anxiety, and depression for increased suicide prevention 

-A resource directory with information on 100 different acute care, inpatient, and outpatient facilities with directions, program and service listings, and contact information for each one! Use our search bar to find facilities that meet your needs. You can search by insurance, location, or for a specific target area such as 'balance' or 'wheelchair'
-

title: IQ Test & Brain Training
description:
Check your IQ with new addictive puzzle game IQ Test  Brain Training.
Start train with this Brain game by solving awesome Logic Puzzles and Brain teasers!

How Many IQ and Brain tasks from this puzzle game  can you solve?
Play The Greatest IQ Test To Find Out If You're A Genius!

In this IQ TEST you have BRAIN training tasks to solve from beginner's mode to Einstein's mode.
Exercise your brain with the most addicting IQ test and Brain training game ever!
This test tests the understanding of the complexity of patterns, the ability to store and retrieve information. It provides insight into the ability to observe, solve problems and learn. The test measures only a subset of intellectual abilities. 

Based on this, valid conclusions can not be drawn about the overall intelligence of the person, the results are approximate.
Einstein's IQ is 160. Have you ever wondered what is your IQ?

Complete interesting puzzles and questions! And the test will help you to find out how smart you are and what score you will get for the test.
Pass the IQ test, share points with friends, compete in sharpness of mind and find out which of you is smarter!

Make you happy make you laugh.But you will be tricked!

What is your IQ level? Blow your mind with IQ Test & Brain Training and show to your friends that you are not completely stupid!

IQ Test and Brain Training is an new addictive free tricky puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers and different riddles testing challenge your mind. 

So many trivia questions to boost your brain power. 

Think outside the box !
Brain training (also called cognitive training) is a program of regular activities purported to maintain or improve one's cognitive abilities. The phrase ‚Äúcognitive ability‚Äù usually refers to components of fluid intelligence such as executive function and working memory. Cognitive training reflects a hypothesis that cognitive abilities can be maintained or improved by exercising the brain, analogous to the way physical fitness is improved by exercising the body.
Cognitive training activities can take place in numerous modalities such as cardiovascular fitness training, playing online games or completing cognitive tasks in alignment with a training regimen and engaging in novel activities such as dance, art, and music.

Mind games for self-improvement fall into two main categories. There are mental exercises and puzzles to maintain or improve the actual working of the brain.

Mental exercises can be done through simple socializing.
Social interaction engages in many facets of cognitive thinking and can facilitate cognitive functioning. Cartwright and Zander noted that if an alien was visiting Earth for the first time, they would be surprised by the amount of social contact humans make.
Caring for one another and growing up in a group setting (family) shows a certain degree of interdependence that shows deep phylogenetic roots. However, this social contact is declining in the United States. Face-to-face interaction is getting more and more sparse. Family and friend visits, including dinners, aren't as common. The amount of social contact a person receives can greatly affect their mental health. A preference for being with others has a high correlation with well-being and with mental long-term and short-term effects on performance. 
Scientific investigation into the effectiveness of brain training activities have concluded that they have no impact on intelligence or everyday cognitive ability, and that most programs had no peer reviewed published evidence of their efficacy. There is ample debate within the scientific community on the efficacy of brain training programs and controversy on the ethics of promoting brain training software to potentially vulnerable subjects. 

What are your waiting for, Download the best IQ Test app ‚ÄúIQ Test and Brain Training‚Äù?

title: Skillz - Logic Brain Games
description:
Want to test your memory skills or give your brain an exercise? Try this fun memory game to improve your memory, speed, get better accuracy, distinguish between colors and much more. This is a fun logical game that gives a good test to your brain.

With this brain game, you can help players to learn to distinguish between different colors and improve their skills. The players sharpen their minds while having fun playing this game. This logical game is a skill test game. Also, you can test your reflexes. There are some fun game puzzles in the game of different kinds. You score points and advance levels. Very fun and addictive game that you will completely enjoy.

***********************
APP HIGHLIGHTS
***********************
To add to playing a logical game and training your brain, you also have a lot of fun with the game. It is packed with different kind of tests that improve your skills and abilities. Here is how ‚Äì 
‚úìImprove your memory
‚úìTrain your reflexes
‚úìIncrease your accuracy
‚úìProve your touch ability
‚úìIncrease your speed
‚úìLearn color coordination

Each level tests your skills and abilities to their peak. After each level, your results are ranked between 1 and 5 Stars and you will be rewarded with a number of Brains. For every Star earned you will be rewarded with one Brain. Using a brain, you can retry from the current round, pass a round or pass a level with 5 stars.
	
Every level is designed to help you improve your skills, memory to sharpen your mind with this addictive game. So, are you ready to take up a brain challenge now? Download this free app ‚Äì ‚ÄúSkillz Logical Brain Game‚Äù now to get started.

The logical game is introducing a Multiplayer feature. Here is how it goes ‚Äì
- Play with your friends or with random players
- Start a game with minimum 2 players. Max limit is 4.
- If you finish the game in Multiplayer mode on the 1st place, you earn a "Win" and 5 Brains. If you finish the game but on the 2nd place, you earn just 3 Brains and no "Win"
- Your Multiplayer Ranking depends on the "Wins"
- Play in Multiplayer mode and unlock Achievements
You will love the feature, so start sharing with your friends.

title: Mind Games
description:
Mind Games is a great collection of games based in part on principles derived from cognitive tasks to help you practice different mental skills.  This app includes nearly 3 dozen of Mindware‚Äôs brain training games (some of which allow you to play 3 times and require upgrading to play more).  All games include your score history and graph of your progress.  The games list shows a summary of your best games and today‚Äôs scores on all games.  Using some principles from standardized testing, your scores are also converted to a comparison scale so that you can see where you need work and excel.  You might also be able to notice the effects of various lifestyle factors on your performance through the score history.

Mind Games is also now available on iPhone/iPad and Windows.

Languages available: English, Portuguese, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, Russian, Japanese.

Description of Games and Theorized Abilities:

Abstraction - Exercise your ability to quickly differentiate between words with a concrete vs. abstract meaning.

Attention Training Game - Exercise your attention. Based on the flanker attention task.  Practice your ability to ignore competing information and processing speed.

Anticipation - Practice your ability to anticipate and respond rapidly.

Changing Directions - Practice your attention, concentration, processing speed, and mental flexibility.

Divided Attention I - Practice your ability to divide your attention and respond rapidly.

Face Memory - Memorize a group of faces and then see if you can recall them.

Math Star - Practice your basic arithmetic skills, speed, and attention to detail.

Memory Racer - Practice for your brain's working memory and processing speed.

Memory Span - Practice your verbal and nonverbal working memory to increase the span of your immediate memory.

Memory Flow - Practice your visual and verbal memory for the flow of events.

Memory Match - Practice your memory for completed tasks.

Mental Categories - Practice your processing speed and quick categorization skills.

Mental Flex - Practice your cognitive flexibility and ability to ignore competing information.

Path Memory - Practice your ability to memorize and reproduce paths.

Serial Memory - Learn a series of 10 numbers and faces in as few trials as you can.

Self-Ordered Learning for Objects - Memorize a sequence of objects using a sequence you determine.

Similarities Scramble - Exercise your knowledge of word relationships.

Spatial Memory - Memorize the locations of the tiles that flip over with increasing numbers of tiles.

Speed Trivia - Exercise your knowledge of general trivia and information.

Verbal Concepts - Exercise your ability to quickly identify conceptual categories.

Vocabulary Star - Exercise your vocabulary and spelling skills.

Vocabulary Power - An un-timed multiple choice vocabulary task.

Visual Memory - Test and practice your visual memory skills.

Word Memory - Memorize 30 words and see if you can remember them.

Mind Games is intended to be brain challenging entertainment. No research has yet been conducted to determine if this app has cognitive benefits.

title: Free Trivia Game. Questions & Answers. QuizzLand.
description:
QuizzLand is the entertainment trivia game where you get unlimited questions that can‚Äôt be found anywhere else. 

Install QuizzLand and answer trivia questions, read interesting explanations, educate yourself!

Just your brain and our quizzes. No need to wait for other players' replies! 

QuizzLand is available in the most spoken languages. If you want the game to be translated into your native language - feel free to share your suggestion with us at contact@quizz.land.

Earn coins for correct answers and spend them on hints for the most challenging questions.

Join the league of top players and collect achievements of all kinds.

Invite friends and get rewarded! 


QuizzLand is:
-free trivia game to test your IQ and general knowledge
-source of valuable and little-known information
-entertaining questions for all categories of interest
-a great opportunity to challenge your friends and other players for top ranks
-delightful learning experience whether you know the answers or not
-detailed explanation for every question


QuizzLand makes learning easy and fun!


*******************************
How to play

-check your knowledge: answer questions, read descriptions for correct answers and compete with other players.
-to complete a level, you have to find the exit in a trivia maze. 
-you get points for each question answered correctly. If you give a wrong answer, no points are added to your account. Moreover, each wrong answer takes one of your lives. Your lives are displayed in the top left corner of the screen.
-if you continue playing after finding the exit, you will get more points for each question answered correctly. 

Questions:

-all questions are filtered by difficulty. The more questions you answer, the more difficult questions you get. The difficulty of a question is indicated by white scales under each question. 
-you get more points for difficult questions.

Coins and lives:

Coins are the in-game currency used in QuizzLand. Use coins to buy lives, hints and other useful options.
-if you want a larger amount of coins, you can make such a purchase in QuizzLand Store. To open the Store, tap on the cart icon in the top right corner of the screen.
-earn coins without buying them: collect you daily coin bonus, watch suggested videos or get coins by playing mini-games inside the maze. 
-you also get coins once the level is completed. In this case, the number of coins depends on how many questions you answered correctly.
-your lives refill in a few minutes but you can also get them faster for coins. You can also get lives if you watch a suggested video.

Question hints:

‚ÄúDouble Chance‚Äù - activate the hint, then choose the answer. If it is incorrect, then you'll be able to try to answer again.
‚ÄúFifty Fifty‚Äù -  eliminate two incorrect answers in a question.
‚ÄúMajority Vote‚Äù - see what answer option the majority of players have chosen.
‚ÄúSkip Question‚Äù - activate the hint to skip a question and answer another instead.

Map hints:

‚ÄúShow Exit‚Äù can be used to find the exit from the maze.
‚ÄúFlip Tile‚Äù allows you to flip any of the unopened questions.
‚ÄúOpen Map‚Äù will flip all the tiles in the maze at once.

Mini memory games:
-play bonus memory games and earn more points. These brain games were created to train your concentration, memory and attention skills.
-you can finish a memory game any time you like, however if you do it before the time is out, your reward will be smaller.

recentChanges:
Good news: we fixed all detected bugs and optimized game performance. Enjoy it!

Our team reads all the reviews and always tries to make the game even better.

Please leave a review if you like what we are doing and feel free to suggest any improvements.
comments: Most questions good but not too difficult. Two annoyances are: Mini games between levels. Why? They are irrelevant to trivia. The second annoyance is that some of the tiles you are required to play are not trivia, but are simply games of chance. "Click the chest to get more coins!" But if you guess wrong, you lose a life...lose too many lives and the game shuts you down. This is super lame.

Very entertaining. Even learning some new things so makes it worth it. Love how you have control over how hard you want the levels to be. That way its not too easy or too hard. Because when there's no level in between i usually just delete the app. It's the perfect game for me before bedtime, its the only game i've found that relaxes me and calms my brain so i can rest and my brain actually shuts off because it's tired. So yes i give 5üåüs thank you for the upload. I'll be keeping this one.

I freaking love it. A bit heavy on the ads but hey, it's free. You can at least watch an ad to get another life once you run out. I don't mind dropping a little $ once I've thoroughly researched an app. Runs smooth other than ads but it's great you're not immediately forced to pay for upgrades before really getting a chance to see if it's really an app for you. Very enjoyable!!

Without doubt the best quiz app out there. I have had some problems with it freezing, I managed to get to level 540 and it would not go any further no matter what I did so I have had to start again from scratch. I've now managed over 100 levels and it's only crashed once so fingers crossed I'll keep my score and history without having to start again.

As games go; this one is pretty good! You only have to watch ads when you get an answer wrong. I am on level 55. Each level has approximately 15+20 questions. You have little mini-games some times. If you win those you are asked if you want to double your score by watching an ad. When you answer a question, right or wrong, it gives an explanation to the question. So you can learn something. It is a little like the original board game of Trivia Pursuit. I think it's a good game.

title: Math Games - Learn Cool Brain Boosting Mathematics
description:
Math Games will provide you with hundreds of hours of math fun, in an engaging and educational game environment! Play daily to quickly boost your or your child's math skills and math speed. Learn and master math the fun way. This fun and exciting way to practice math is perfect for today's remote learning environment!

This colorful math game is great for students of all ages, from kids to adults. Although the mathematics topics are those studied by primary, elementary, and middle-school students (kindergarten to grade 8), this app provides excellent review and practice for older students as well. Math Games is also perfect for introducing your child to new mathematical concepts. With a little guidance, your child will quickly learn and conquer each mathematics challenge and really enjoy learning.

Collect all five rewards for each of the 60 exciting math challenges. The rewards will take hundreds of hours to complete, and you'll notice an incredible improvement in your mathematics ability, as well as overall concentration and memory. This cool math game's cute animations and cool sound effects will give your brain an extra boost in the learning process. Each quiz will exercise and enrich your mathematics knowledge.

This cool mathematical app is perfect for kids, students, and even adults, and includes questions and quizzes for learning, practicing, and mastering the following math topics:

Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, Negative Numbers, Fractions, Decimal Numbers, Money, Exponents, Square Roots, Conversions, Comparisons, Percentages, Rounding, Remainder, Factorials, Binary Conversion, Age Calculation, and Math Operations. Add, Subtract, Multiply, and Divide all come in Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced levels of difficulty, as well as Fill in the Blank challenges. These math concepts are typically covered in kindergarten, 1st grade, 2nd grade, 3rd grade, 4th grade, 5th grade, 7th grade, and 8th grade.

This educational game comes in a very small app-size and is perfect for learners of all ages, girls and boys, parents and grandparents, friends, cousins, and classmates. Math Games will boost your brain power with three quiz levels of difficulty for basic math operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division), and several other more advanced math challenges (rounding, fractions, percentages, money, exponents). Children will quickly master times tables as well.

For each category, choose 10, 25 or 100 questions. All questions are randomly generated so each quiz is completely unique. Earn energy for each correct answer (one energy per number), use your energy to get hints when you're stuck (2 energy per hint), and earn up to 5 rewards for each challenge. Rewards include Perfect 10, Perfect 25, Perfect 100, and 1000 Energy earned badges. 

Like hearing the math question read to you? Simply tap the audio button to have the question read out loud.

This math game quiz is designed for smart phones and tablets of all sizes. Through this educational app, parents, teachers, and tutors can help young learners achieve a huge improvement in their math skills, and provide a great workout for young math learners brains. Math Games will help you develop mental skills, improve your memory, focus, mental speed, and much more. With this math app, children will learn and master math concepts very quickly and rise to the top of the class. 

Boost your brain's mathematics ability and improve your math knowledge in a cool game-like educational environment. This math app is especially useful for today's home schooling and distance learning needs. Keep your brain fit through regular math exercises. Learn math the fun way ‚Äî get Math Games today!

If you have any comments or suggestions, please email me at handtechnics@gmail.com. Good luck!

title: FactTechz Ultimate Brain Booster - Binaural Beats
description:
This app is presented to you by FactTechz. 

Ultimate Brain Booster is a collection of Binaural Beats, which are a type of calming and soothing music which can help you to relax your mind. With the help of this app, you can:

-Relax and calm your mind with relaxation music.

-Aid your study sessions with calm study music.

-Meditate calmly with meditation music.

-Much More..

There are 5 types of binaural beats and these are the main features of it:

Delta Waves: Sleep
Theta Waves: Deep Meditation
Alpha Waves: Relaxation
Beta Waves: Concentration and Cognition
Gamma Waves: Intelligence and Memory

You don't have to worry of frequency settings and technical sections because we have arranged the binaural beats according to their effects on the human brain.

The science of binaural beat is really simple. One sound frequency in one ear, and another sound frequency in the opposite ear, creating a two-tone effect in the mid-brain that is actually perceived to be one tone. This causes an "Entrainment " effect in the brain that has a variety of results including relaxation, reduced anxiety, memory recall, increased intelligence (long-term) etc.

Here are some official scientific researches on binaural beats:

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5233742/

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5487409/

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6165862/

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4995205/

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/29222722

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4428073/

Special Note: Always wear earphones or headphones while listening to binaural beats to enjoy highest effectiveness.

FAQ:
---------------

Q1. What should my pose be during listening to these tracks? and volume ? and earphones?

Ans: You can just do your work (any work) and listen to these beats simultaneously. But if you be seated at one place and listen it in a 'meditation pose', it will increase its effectiveness. This applies to all the music.

70% volume.

Regarding earphones, you can use any earphone or headphone you like. Binaural beats works in any and every earphone or big headphones.

Q2. What is the duration limit per day?

Ans: You can listen to any beat for 10 minutes. 10 Minutes is actually more than enough for each class of music. But if you have free time, then you can listen to one beat continuously for 3 times. 30 Minutes is the general limit. You should not listen to each beat continuously for more than 3 times i.e 10√ó3= 30 minutes.

Q3. Can I hear all beats one by one?

Ans: If you want, you can listen to another music after 1 hr after listening to any music. Gap can be 1 hr between every track. Its so because your mind should have enough time to process each beat effectively.

Q4. What is the best time to listen to these tracks?

Ans: Anytime! You can listen to these tracks anytime, anywhere you want. But as the fact is, morning is the best time to listen to the binaural beats. Morning is a divine time, so you would be able to connect more to yourself spiritually.

Q.5 How much time will it take to feel the results?

Ans: It depends! Everyone's mind structure is different. But if you listen any music for 10 minutes (according to your goal) every day without any skip day, then you should start feeling the results after 3 to 4 weeks.

Q6. I am a student, which beat is best for me?

Ans: Study music is specially made for students and you should listen to it if you are a student. During night hours, you can listen to relaxation music to relax your mind so that your mind works at its best the next day.

Buy Ultimate Mind Booster and provide us your feedback in the feedback section!

Wish you a happy and a healthy life.

description:

This application contains exciting Question Answer, Quiz games, and IQ Games in order to activate your brain. These simple brain exercises will help to awaken your thoughts, stimulate the flow of blood and also help the neural associations. These games are sort of rapid-fire kinds that test your brain by asking logical questions, math problems, and mental visualization. title: Emotional Brain Study
description:
Are you good at ignoring emotional distraction? Can you control what emotional information to remember and what to forget? Neuroscientists and emotion researchers at University College London (UCL) think these abilities are related to how we feel.

Find out for yourself by playing these fun games and help advance science while you play!

In this study scientists from the UCL Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience are exploring how much control people have over experiencing emotions, how this relates to their mood and how this changes over time.

Each time you use the app to play a game and record your mood you will be contributing to this scientific study and you‚Äôll be helping the neuroscientists to understand the mind‚Äôs emotional control system.

The app will help you track your mood. Over time you can track your mood and emotional control performance pattern to find out whether your own mood is changing as a function of your control ability or not. The app will also allow you to measure your emotional control ability and compare it to other players‚Äô ability.

Running this study in the general population through an app provides the researchers with a unique opportunity to understand how these processes operate in everyday life. This information is very useful to advance our understanding of how mood can be improved in individuals who frequently experience low mood.

Data privacy: Your data privacy is important to us. All data collected as part of this study is fully anonymised. No personally relevant information will be collected and the anonymous data that is being collected is used only for scientific research.

Funding: The app is supported by the Wellcome Trust.

title: Wordplay: Exercise your brain
description:
Wordplay is a new educational word game with challenging crosswords and vocabulary puzzles. Train your brain, make and unscramble words while solving crossword puzzles. Play the word game with friends or enjoy it individually. Challenge yourself with a unique and addictive combination of word unscramble games, relaxing crosswords and stunning locations full of wonders. 

Embark on an amazing world tour by tackling word puzzles and unlocking tricky new levels ‚Äì just swipe and match letters for a word connect. Enjoy the calm and engrossing gameplay, enhance your vocab skills and improve your memory by completing hundreds of increasingly complex crossword puzzles!

If you like crosswords, word connect and making words out of letters in general, then Wordplay is right up your alley. Use all your wits, test your memory and take your word knowledge to new heights. Wordplay combines the most sophisticated word puzzle mechanics available for a real bookworm and erudite. How many levels can you beat? 

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings. You also have the ability to play all of the word games with no wifi (offline). Your progress will be uploaded once you go online. Hurry up to exercise your brain - just make words!

What awaits you in Wordplay:

‚óè Hundreds of mind game levels with fun unscramble word puzzles
‚óè Daily challenge: complete daily tasks to collect words and valuable prizes
‚óè Carte blanche: no time limits or penalties for wrong answers
‚óè Relaxing country backgrounds and self-paced, stress-free gameplay
‚óè Killer brain-twisters: get free constant updates with new challenges
‚óè Hints available: manage it yourself or use hints when necessary
‚óè Bonuses for additional words: more rewards for our savviest players
‚óè Brain exercises: try both our entertaining and educational game option by G5 Entertainment AB

title: QuizzClub: Family Trivia Game with Fun Questions
description:
QuizzClub is a unique game with cool trivia questions to train your brain, increase your IQ and boost your logic and memory. Suitable for all ages, QuizzClub is great both for kids and for seniors. No matter what country you are from and what your hobby is ‚Äì just try playing QuizzClub. We bet you‚Äôll lose track of time!

The game‚Äôs difficulty depends on your progress: you begin with the easy questions and smoothly proceed to the hard ones as you play more. Sometimes we will send you the questions of random difficulty ‚Äì just to make it more educational and fun.

QuizzClub is a 10 million community of trivia fans who like to challenge their brains and boost general knowledge online. QuizzClub offers you a lot of opportunities to increase your brainpower. Answer trivia questions and keep your mind sharp!

Every day QuizzClub users upload new trivia quizzes to share their knowledge with you absolutely for free. Thousands of trivia facts about the most astonishing things in the world are waiting for you!
If you are an expert in any field, be sure you‚Äôll find a way to test yourself in a fun way with our daily quizzes. QuizzClub general knowledge quiz questions cover a vast variety of topics: history, science, geography, popular culture, art. All the information provided is picked carefully and checked for factual mistakes by the community of elite reviewers.

This app was created for the fans of QuizzClub website. Now your favorite intellectual game is available in a convenient mobile version. Learn new things and increase your intelligence everywhere!
