title: Brain Aliens: Earth Invasion
description:
Save the Earth in the first complete brain training game for both kids & adults!

Brain Aliens believe they are very intelligent and they have come to the Earth to absorb all kids‚Äô brain power to continue growing their brain. Professor Cerebellum has discovered this fact and has built a super cannon to frighten the invaders with brain waves. We ask players to use their mobile device connected to Professor‚Äôs Lab to play minigames in order to generate brain energy and charge the cannon to shoot the aliens.

Enjoy learning while doing mental work out thanks to this mind game‚Äôs features:

- Funny science fiction background story
- 12 different minigames to test your brain skills and improve memory
- Innovative dynamic interface to train mental agility and do brain exercise
- Different profile and difficulty for kids and adults (kid-safe content)
- Complete stats: memory, logic, perception and analysis
- Compete with your Facebook friends with online rankings
- Game Center integration with 30 achievements and leaderboard
- Practice languages thanks to multilingual support: English, French, Spanish, Catalan, German, Portuguese and more coming soon

Brain Aliens minigames are based in WISC test exercises. Scientific studies prove that playing brain games for kids and adults help improving mental skill and cognitive capabilities. Mental exercise is considered beneficial to warding off Alzheimer's disease and other forms of dementia. This free brain game and personal trainer will help you improve concentration.

Thanks to this educational free brain training game kids can learn spelling, basic math and general knowledge in a funny way while improving their mental skills.

Play, train and learn with your children in this kid-friendly adventure from outer space!

title: Mindboo - Brain battle royale and brain training
description:
What‚Äôs Better than Boosting Your Brainpower? Mindboo is a mixture of brain training and brain challenges with touches of a social network. It is available in two modes. Mindboo brain labs and Mindboo battle Royale to improve pretty much everything in your head including attention, processing speed, memory, math skills, focus, thinking, solving problems and so on, ensuring quicker learning and improvement in brain connectivity.  Mindboo is going to nail pretty much the whole thing on the head 

### OVERVIEW ###

- MINDBOO BRAIN LABORATORIES

you must travel on a journey from the foundation laboratory up to the Mars laboratory. Does this sound simple and easy? It‚Äôs not! To reach your destination, you must solve various challenges that put your cognitive skills to the test, including concentration, memory processing, math, focus, analytical thinking, spatial reasoning, logic, deduction, inferences, and more.  Each laboratory focuses on a different area of the brain.

Each laboratory has different types of free scientific exercises, different types of challenges and different levels to improve your brain power.  you need to pass all the challenges in each laboratory to move to the next one. Some challenges may need to be played against another player or may need body physical movements. These challenges will set your brain on fire in order to study the way it reacts in different conditions


- BATTLE ROYALE
It is a survival challenge where you are required to collect resources and weapons and survive as long as possible. it is an online challenge where play against up to 60 people at the same time from around the world. 

- STAY SOCIAL

* Follow your  friends, family and your favourite celebrities and meet new people on your social media network
* Share photos, videos, and your favorite memories. let the world know what‚Äôs happening with you 
* Get notifications when friends like and comment on your posts
* Backup photos by saving them in albums
* Follow your favourite artists, websites, and companies to get their latest news
* Discover what your friends and celebrities are talking about
* Share, like, or reply to posts
* Team up with your friends and let the challenge starts
* Chat with others
* Find your friends, family and celebrities brain power
* Detailed performance tracking, your brain ranking among others


- CAUTION
Some challenges need body movement.. make sure you play them in safe places 


- PERMISSIONS AND DEVICE CAPABILITY

This app uses device rotations in order to calculate device rotations for some challenges.. this feature is based on the compass of your device
This app uses device motions and acceleration in order to calculate user speed for some challenges.. this feature is based on the motion of your device

- NOTES

* Mindboo is generally FREE to use and offers in-game purchases.
* It is suitable for ages 7 years old and above. 
* The more you use with Mindboo, the more you‚Äôll improve critical cognitive skills that are designed to boost productivity, earning power and self-confidence.
* Mindboo is still in its early stages. we are happy to hear from you on official Mindboo service account or on team@mindboo.com

Hope you enjoy using Mindboo

title: Brain
description:
The brain is a soft, spongy mass. It is protected by the bones of the skull and three thin membranes called brain sheaths. The brain is surrounded by a fluid called cerebrospinal fluid or cerebrospinal fluid. This fluid is contained in the spaces between the membranes of the brain and in the cavities that are inside the brain and are called the ventricles.

The forebrain is the largest part of the brain. It is located in the upper part of the brain and uses information from our senses to tell us what is happening around us, and also gives the body orders how to react to it. He controls reading, thought processes, learning, speech and emotions. The forebrain is divided into left and right hemispheres, which control various functions. The right hemisphere controls the muscles of the left half of the body, the left hemisphere controls the muscles of the right half of the body.

Cerebellum. The cerebellum is located under the forebrain in the back of the brain. The cerebellum controls balance and complex functions, such as walking and speech.

Brain stem. The brain stem connects the brain with the spinal cord. It controls hunger and thirst, and in addition - breathing, body temperature, blood pressure and other basic body functions.

General information about the brain.
The human brain has not yet been fully studied. The brain is located in the human skull and occupies approximately 80% of its volume.

ALL LEVELS ARE SUITABLE FOR ADULTS AND KIDS

Math games really open your mind like an IQ test. Logical puzzles create new connections for advanced thought and mental speed. They make strong the connections between brain cells.

All questions can be solved by basic and complex mathematical operations taught at school. Only interesting addition subtraction multiplication and division operations. summary: Challenge yourself with Complicated Maths Puzzle Game and Interesting Riddles
recentChanges:
Welcome to version 1.21
Have fun with these challenging math games.
comments: I loved these varied and exceptionally challenging math puzzles. The hints provided were helpful, but were not so obvious as to give away the answer without serious thought. You really have to think outside the box; nonlinear thought is required to figure out the underlying pattern. Once you identify the pattern, it is then straightforward to solve the puzzle.

Enjoyable and a bit challenging at times. There were a couple of problems that weren't clear how you were supposed to know to use a certain number as a reference. The clearest form of this was on one of the questions, the hint was " - 40". I dont know how I was supposed to know to subtract each answer from 40. It just seemed like an arbitrary number that you had to use the hint to know. Other than those questions, which there were only a few, I really enjoyed using this app.

Good for getting basic math practice in from what I am able to play. Unfortunately I am stuck on a level that requires multiple entries and will not allow multiple entries. I had the right answer, but could not enter it. Very frustrating. Maybe a quick tutorial on the various ways you may have to enter answers would fix this. I probably could figure it out if it isn't a bug, but there are millions of games out there. This just turned me off. Next!

Made me recall the simple rules like pemdas, also adding some "additional" rules to solve levels as they progress; many answers based on correlation of number sets. Being dyslexic, this game is/was very empowering for me, as I started out sailing through without having to write anything down to solve any of the puzzles. However, after I got stuck on level 58 (by coincidence) my shrink lowered my adderall dose and now I can't make it past level 30 without working the problems on paper. :(

Some of the puzzles are pretty difficult, but none are too difficult that they can't be completed with a little math knowledge and a bit of outside-the-box thinking. Overall, I enjoyed this app, and completing it is a good brain exercise. Some of the puzzles don't actually require math to solve, which annoyed me at first, but after doing a few I thought it was good to force my brain to think more outside the box than just simply looking for a mathematical pattern. Pretty darn good app.

title: IQ Test: Intelligence Test
description:
In IQ Test - Intelligence Test, we have made multiple IQ tests for you to measure different aspects of your IQ as you'd like. The IQ tests that are available are:

1) Emotional IQ: Measures your emotional spectrum
2) Logical IQ: Measures logical intelligence and how well you could use your logic to solve problems, patterns
3) Quantitative IQ: In this test, you will measure your analytical and mathematical abilities
4) Memory test: Memorize the sequence of numbers & letters to guess them correctly!

IQ score is an interesting and important concept to measure. Knowing your IQ will allow you to know a lot of who you are, your intelligence, and which areas of your mind you should improve.

We have also added a brain teaser section named under (MYSTERY TEST). This test is a unique, interesting, and fun IQ test in which you have to answer all questions correctly to pass it!

Results & Detailed Results of IQ test - Intelligence Test
- We have added simple and comprehensive results regarding your IQ score range. The detailed results include your strengths, weaknesses, celebrity types, and much more!
- The simple IQ test results show you a range of your IQ and a calculation of whether you are average, above average, or a genius!

Objective of IQ tests: IQ is a concept that is used to measure some defined skills of people. The IQ ranking is made from a relative point of view. In other words, some variables are used and then an intelligence test is made. This intelligence test is made in a way that measures the IQ of a person in those areas. It is very difficult to make an IQ test that truly takes a person's absolute true intelligence. However, by taking a common statistic (for example language, or counting), we can make an IQ test that measures people's intelligence. Scientists approach IQ measuring tests in a similar way. By taking common variables as the core statistic, a general IQ test can be made that measures the IQ of a huge portion of the population. 

Important Note: IQ Test - Intelligence Test is aimed to be fun, entertaining, and educating. Under no circumstances the user should think that this is absolutely representative of his true intelligence and character. Enjoy it!

title: Study Music üéß Memory Booster: (Ultimate Brain)
description:
‚òÖ Ultimate brain booster app with over 8 million downloads.‚òÖ 

Can't focus on your work? Study Music üéß Memory Booster combines high quality songs with binaural beats and nature sounds, it is a science-based app that will motivate you to stay focused and get things done. 

Avoid procrastination with Study Music and achieve your goals! 

Staying focused for long periods of time is hard. Your attention is constantly being diverted in this world of distractions. Select a category that fits best to your task or your music taste. To solve problems, select Solve; to memorize new information, just select Memorize and so on. Customize your music by adding nature sounds and alpha waves. Finally add timer to start your studying session. 

Calm your mind and get things done!

BE PRODUCTIVE‚úçÔ∏è 
‚Ä¢ Change your unproductive study sessions to efficient ones with calming music. 
‚Ä¢ Add realistic nature sounds to transform your room into a forest or a beach. 
‚Ä¢ Listen offline or stream online.
‚Ä¢ Read interesting science facts while studying to maximize your productivity. 
‚Ä¢ Concentrate on a daily routine and manage ADHD. 
‚Ä¢ Add binaural beats to boost your brain. 
‚Ä¢ Use timer functionality to work efficiently. Combine pomodoro with music! 

Study Music is the study app you've been dreaming about! 

FEATURES‚úèÔ∏è 
‚Ä¢ üéß Different songs for different tasks such as Focus, Study and Memorize and much more. 
‚Ä¢ üéµ Alpha waves, rain sounds, and nature sounds can be added to your music. 
‚Ä¢ üéì Background playback. You can use other apps or turn off your screen while playing music.
‚Ä¢ ‚èØÔ∏è Notification controls for your music. 
‚Ä¢ üìö Simple interface and gorgeous design with high-quality graphics. 
‚Ä¢ üí° Every song has an interesting fact to read to keep you on track. 
‚Ä¢ ‚è±Ô∏è Add timer to your music to work efficiently. 

1-Ultimate Brain Booster
2-Study with music for free
3-Offline listening or streaming
4-Nature sounds and binaural beats
5-Pomodoro timer helps you focus
6-Learn quick science facts

FAQs 

What are these songs for? 
Focus is for helping you to focus,Study is for assisting you when you are studying, Read is there for your reading time, Memorize is for helping you to memorize information, Solve is for problem-solving and Meditate is for peaceful thinking and meditating time. 

How to use it? 
It's simple. Just select the music for your task and add nature sounds or beta waves. For example, if you can't focus on your work properly you can select the Focus music and simply do your work. We recommend using the app while you are studying, reading, creating etc. Or you can use it while you are sleeping or meditating too if you want. 

Do I need an internet connection?
No. You can use Study Music without an internet connection. But some of the songs need an internet connection in order for you to listen.

How is Study Music - Memory Booster different from other music apps?
Study Music is the first music app focused on cognitive tasks such as memorization and problem-solving. We are constantly updating it with your suggestions for a better experience. 

What are binaural beats? How does this affect me? 
Binaural beats are auditory processing artifacts caused by specific physical stimuli. This effect was discovered in 1839 by Heinrich Wilhelm Dove and earned greater public awareness in the late 20th century based on claims coming from the alternative medicine community that binaural beats could help induce relaxation, meditation, creativity, focus and other desirable mental states. The effect on the brainwaves depends on the difference in frequencies of each note.

title: Math Brain - Learning Games Quiz. Arithmetic game.
descriptionHTML:
Who says math is hard and boring? Level up your math skills with many interesting math levels! Math Brain learning quiz is a unique app with which you will increase the concentration, reaction, and speed of your brain! You can develop memory, attention, and logical thinking. With every-day constant basic mathematics exercises, you will also develop multiplication, division, subtraction, and addition.

This is a collection of amazing equations aimed at developing your mental abilities. Every day, a record is kept of your successes, which you can analyze every day. All indicators are evaluated on a common scale, and you can easily see what specific skills you need to work on. Train your concentration, speed of reaction, memory, flexibility of thinking, and general knowledge. Information on how your skills develop will be available in your profile, and you will easily understand what else you can work on.

Features:

title: Top 10 Brain Boosting Foods and Remedies
description:
This is one of the best apps you could ever find in any app store because it contains the explanation of the most vital organ in human body.
It contains everything you will need to know regarding your brain right from the Introduction, Brain Cancer Symptoms, Foods that boost Brain function, Remedies that boost Brain function, How to boost Brain Power, How to increase your brain power and How you will get smarter everyday.

Physiology of the Brain;

The brain is an organ that serves as the center of the nervous system in all vertebrate and most invertebrate animals. The brain is located in the head, usually close to the sensory organs for senses such as vision. The brain is the most complex organ in a vertebrate's body. In a human, the cerebral cortex contains approximately 15‚Äì33 billion neurons, each connected by synapses to several thousand other neurons. These neurons communicate with one another by means of long protoplasmic fibers called axons, which carry trains of signal pulses called action potentials to distant parts of the brain or body targeting specific recipient cells.

title: Wikipedia
description:
The best Wikipedia experience on your Mobile device. Ad-free and free of charge, forever. With the official Wikipedia app, you can search and explore 40 million+ articles in 300+ languages, no matter where you are.

== What people say about the app ==

‚ÄúIt works without mocking, mistakes, advertisements, all sorts of snaps, and that probably is the most important thing.‚Äù ‚Äì Balan Radu

‚ÄúEverything and more. Free, objective, impartial and neutral. What more could you want?‚Äù ‚Äì Enzo Sinapsi

‚ÄúIt's an essential application for a person like me who is in an academic career.‚Äù ‚Äì A Google User

‚ÄúWikipedia is a complete solution to all of your doubts. If you search anything on the Wikipedia it gives you accurate results about it.‚Äù ‚Äì Debraj Bhattacharya

== Why you‚Äôll love the this app ==

1. It‚Äôs free and open
Wikipedia is the encyclopedia that anyone can edit. Articles on Wikipedia are freely licensed and the app code is 100% open source. The heart and soul of Wikipedia is a community of people working to bring you unlimited access to free, reliable and neutral information.

2. No ads
Wikipedia is a place to learn, not a place for advertising. This app is made by the Wikimedia Foundation, a nonprofit organization that supports and operates Wikipedia. We provide this service in the pursuit of open knowledge that‚Äôs always ad-free and never tracks your data. 

3. Read in your language
Search 40 million articles in over 300 languages in the world‚Äôs largest source of information. Set your preferred languages in the app and easily switch between them when browsing or reading. 

4. Use it offline
Save your favorite articles and read Wikipedia offline with ‚ÄúMy lists‚Äú. Name lists as you like and collect articles across different languages. Saved articles and reading lists are synced across all your devices and are available even when you do not have internet connectivity.

5. Attention to detail and night mode
The app embraces Wikipedia‚Äôs simplicity and adds delight to it. A beautiful and distraction-free interface lets you focus on the essential: reading articles. With text size adjustment and themes in pure black, dark, sepia or light, you can choose the most pleasant reading experience for you.

== Broaden your horizon with these features == 

1. Customize your Explore feed
‚ÄúExplore‚Äú lets you see recommended Wikipedia content including current events, popular articles, captivating freely-licensed photos, events on this day in history, suggested articles based on your reading history, and more.

2. Find and search 
Quickly find what you're looking for by searching within articles or with the search bar at the top of the app. You can even search using your favorite emojis or voice-enabled search.

== We‚Äôd love your feedback ==

1. To send feedback from the app: 
In the menu, press "Settings", then "About the Wikipedia app", then "Send app feedback".

2. If you have experience with Java and the Android SDK, then we look forward to your contributions! More info: https://mediawiki.org/wiki/Wikimedia_Apps/Team/Android/App_hacking 

3. By using this app, you agree to the automatic transmission of crash reports to a third-party service provider. If you would like to disable this feature, press "Settings," then turn off "Send crash reports" under the Privacy section.

4. Explanation of permissions needed by the app: https://mediawiki.org/wiki/Wikimedia_Apps/Android_FAQ#Security_and_Permissions 

5. Privacy policy: https://m.wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Privacy_policy 

6. Crash report third-party service provider‚Äôs privacy policy:
https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement 

7. Terms of Use: https://m.wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use 

8. About the Wikimedia Foundation:
The Wikimedia Foundation is a charitable nonprofit organization that supports and operates Wikipedia and the other Wiki projects. It is funded mainly through donations. For more information, please visit our website: https://wikimediafoundation.org/

recentChanges:
- Updated design of Search interface. Search your reading lists, browsing history, and Wikipedia itself from a single place.
- Minor bug fixes and enhancements.
comments: As the old saying goes "don't fix it if it ain't broke". Previously, users were able to choose where to save an article, now the article is automatically saved to the list "Saved". Now, if users want to circumvent such automatic saving, you added the options "Add to another...", "Move from..." and "Remove from..." --- problem with that is that these options COULD ALL BE TRIVIALIZED if the previous system was still in place.

After using wikipedia app for about 2 years, I've been encountered some problem,first when you want to read the article that has been saved,sometimes it doesn't load at all,and tell me that i do not connected to the internet even though i already downloaded it,two when it successfully load the page there are some photos that's not loaded,so i don't really know the context of the description of the pictures

Love this app, love wikipedia. Far better than searching Wikipedia articles in a browser on mobile. It's easy to use and the in-page seach function is particularly useful, as well as the quick introduction pieces you would normally only be able to access by hovering over a link on a PC or laptop. The quick edits are pretty good, if I'm bored I might steamroller through a couple of image captions or article descriptions. I also enjoy reading the main page in the morning.

Five stars when the many bugs in the latest version (as of 2020-10-29) are corrected. A pleasure to browse, when working! For now, though: üî∏ I've tested on several devices. The 'loading' animation is endless, and the first paragraph or more is missing. Also, it's now hard to get to History.

Wikipedia is the best thing on the internet. Keep this app on your phone and you will benifit from it. App layout is very nice and clean. Articles can be saved offline and synched across devices. You can customize font size, page color and change language of article.

¬ª Choose the trivia category that you want.

¬ª Each round serves 20 questions.

¬ª Watch videos to earn more coins.
¬ª You have 25s to answer each challenge.

¬ª You can even skip a question if you are not sure, without losing points.

‚≠êÔ∏è QUIZ CATEGORIES:

‚òÜ Animals
‚òÜ Art and Literature
‚òÜ Entertainment Mix

‚òÜ Music, artists, charts, songs

BY PLAYING OUR GENERAL KNOWLEDGE TRIVIA YOU:

‚úì Challenge your skills
‚úì Expand your awareness
‚úì Increase your IQ
‚úì Keep your memory sharp
‚úì Reduce Stress

üéâ FOR FUN

If you like free family trivia games, you will love our app that covers knowledge categories and offers competitive spirit through quiz battles like real one on one quiz challenges. Invite a friend and play head to head.

ü§î FOR IQ, LEARNING & FOCUS

Only the best puzzles are included and new updated questions, with new levels and knowledge categories. Our collection of general knowledge quizzes, offers you hundreds of levels to unlock and is a vast source of education. You might not realize it, but each day you play, you increase your GK, train focus and IQ.

‚ô• SEND US YOUR FEEDBACK ‚ô•

comments: I love the game but getting coins is nearly impossible. Sorry, I don't pay to play free games. Pretty ridiculous. Yes, I would like to see more options to gain coins other than spending money. Plus, for coins being so hard to acquire there sure are a lot of ads! Other than that, I do like the small amount of time ( because coins run out) I get to play

The ads are out of control. Seriously. I tried the game for less than 5 minutes. I had to uninstall. The amount of ads (15 seconds of trivia for 25+ seconds of ads) is just way too much. I didn't even get to play long enough to see if I would WANT to purchase no ads. As it stands now, I would absolutely NOT pay money for this. Very bare bones trivia highlighted by greedy ad behavior.

I'm really enjoying this game, and don't understand some of the main complaints about it? 1) if ads are annoying you, you can turn off your data/WiFi and play offline, it works perfectly and no ads! 2) saw some complaints about having to pay for extra gems and coins, but for me there's always an option to earn more by watching (unlimited) ads, if you don't want to spend any money. Perhaps this was a recent update? this game is really addictive and fun.

Great game. Very addictive. I'm loving it a lot. Update: Okay now that I've had the chance to play this game for a bit I can see that its a racket. You can't earn gems and you die after just one wrong answer and have to pay in order not to lose your progress. Yeah you do get one free life on occasion but that's a gimmick to get you to play more and spend more. Its a shame because I like this game and it could be a good game if it wasn't all about making money.

Prepare to spend and spend and spend!!! One wrong answer and you need to pay! Constant bombardment of ads or you can pay, pay, pay. Far too expensive for a mediocre product. Pictures you need to identify are tiny and impossibly to see on a 5" phone screen so be prepared to pay if you can't make it what is in the image (30 second timer runs out and you fail). This Game is very expensive compared to other similar games.

title: Color Brain
description:
Color Brain!
In this fast paced, reaction game, you will be tested to see how fast each side of your brain can react! It has been scientifically shown that the left side of your brain usually reads the words whereas the right side of your brain usually looks at the word and analyzes its colors. In this game each side of your brain will be put to the test to see how fast your brains can think whether the word matches the color of the word!

How to Play!
In this game you will be given 1 second to make a decisions as to whether the word shown on the screen matches the color the word was typed in. You can select either the X meaning that they don't match or the checkmark meaning that they do match. Keep going until your brain farts or your pick the wrong one! If at any point you go over one second or you make the wrong decision, you will automatically lose! See how far you can get!

title: Brain health
description:
There are lots of books and articles that talk about how to become more intelligent or how to train your brain to be healthier, and many of these recommendations have been scientifically investigated.
Every brain changes with age, and mental function changes along with it but there are some bad habits that can trigger brain changes. An unhealthy lifestyle, in general, may increase our chances of developing dementia, including Alzheimer‚Äôs.
Mental decline is common, and it's one of the most feared consequences of aging. 
That‚Äôs why we tried to combine some of the best directions to guide you towards a lifestyle that will help your brain health.

title: Brain Test: Challenge Your Brain
description:
Brain Test: Challenge Your Brain will challenge your intelligence by presenting you some of the most fun and tricky brain puzzle questions. Solve the brain puzzles and improve your IQ score. The questions are tricky, simple, fun, and challenging at the same time. IQ tests these days are a bit too professional. So, as Cozy Games, we have made you some of the most fun and cozy brain tricky tests to find out your IQ for yourself. 

Do you know how many times the digit 5 appears between 100?
Can you recognize the shadows of images?
Are you good at seeing patterns between objects and pictures?
Can you find the difference between two pictures?
Which bottle would fill up the fastest if we have a water tap that is being poured out?
... and so many more exciting questions for brain and iq testers!

IQ score cannot only be improved solely by taking very professional tests. It needs to be improved with questions that are fun and puzzle based. Brain Test: Measure your IQ will take you to the next level when it comes to improving your smartness and intelligence. 

Brain puzzles are very famous these days. So, we have combined the most fun entertaining questions for amazing users. The mind is yet to be solved and the brain is yet to be discovered. Measure your IQ and find out your intelligence while having fun with challenging entertaining brain questions.

Brain Test: Challenge Your Brain are good for your brain. But brain puzzle tests are good for your brain and also IQ!

Results & Detailed Results
- In the results section, you will be measuring the following:
1) Analytical IQ
2) Spatial IQ
3) Quantitative IQ
4) Emotional IQ
5) General IQ

- In the detailed results section, you will be measuring your results regarding career tracks, weaknesses, strengths, and romantic types.

The way we have established this grading method is by giving weight to each of the question that has to do with these IQ types. As a result, we get a general understanding of your IQ. Since the IQ's are measured specifically, we are also able to provide you with a detailed result section that has to do with these IQ scores individually. 

Enjoy Brain Test: Challenge Your Brain

Important Note: This game is made for entertainment and educational purposes. Under no condition the user should regard it as an absolutely accurate model of the human intelligence.

Enjoy!

title: IQ test - logic & intelligence test for your brain
description:
Take the iq test and check visual spatial abilities of your brain. IQ tests train logical reasoning skills, increase counting speed and develop intelligence.

The app presents the visual spatial iq test by Hans Eysenck, aimed at identifying specific abilities that can not be determined using general iq tests.

To quantify the level of intelligence, psychologists have introduced the concept of IQ - intelligence quotient. The iq test is any test that assesses the level of mental development. Typically, tasks in such tests are distributed by level of complexity, each of which is standardized. Practicing on different types of tests and teaching your brain to different types of questions, you get a real opportunity to increase your iq by several positions.

While taking iq quiz, you can skip questions and return to them at the end of the iq quiz. After you pass the iq quiz, the correct answers will be available to you with the analysis of the results. You can share the result with friends and call them to take the iq quiz.

You have 30 minutes to finish the brain test. Do not think too long on one logic question. Perhaps you are on the wrong track and it is better to move on to the next question. But do not give up too quickly, because most logic questions are can be solved if your brain shows a little patience. Remember that questions become more difficult by the end of the test. Every person is able to solve part of the proposed logic questions, but no one is able to cope with all the questions of this brain test in half an hour.

IQ test does not contain tricky logic questions, but you always have to consider several solutions. Before proceeding, make sure that you understand the condition of the task correctly. You will waste your time if you take up a decision without understanding what the question is about.

Unfortunately, no intelligence test assessing can be considered universal, each iq test is only suitable for a specific category of people. This iq test by Hans Eysenck is intended for literate people between the ages of 18 and 50-60, with an iq slightly higher than average. IQ tests (for assessing intelligence) are subject to the effects of training and education, which, with routine testing, can lead to improved results. Users under the age of 18 and over 55-60 years on average will show lower results than all others when passing this iq test.

Stay tuned for updates. Email us at iqquizlab@gmail.com for all questions and suggestions. Looking forward to hearing your suggestions!

title: General Psychology
description:
Psychology is the science of behavior and mind, including conscious and unconscious phenomena, as well as feeling and thought. It is an academic discipline of immense scope and diverse interests that, when taken together, seek an understanding of the emergent properties of brains, and all the variety of epiphenomena they manifest. As a social science it aims to understand individuals and groups by establishing general principles and researching specific cases.
In this field, a professional practitioner or researcher is called a psychologist and can be classified as a social, behavioral, or cognitive scientist. Psychologists attempt to understand the role of mental functions in individual and social behavior, while also exploring the physiological and biological processes that underlie cognitive functions and behaviors.
This App Contains Material:
1 Etymology and definitions
2 History 
3 Disciplinary organization 
4 Major schools of thought 
5 Themes 
6 Applications 
7 Research methods 
8 Contemporary issues in methodology and practice
9 Ethics 
10 List of social psychology theories
11 Psychological phenomena

It offers a free puzzle every day, but very seldom can you actually download that puzzle, or even see it in your available puzzles list. You can watch ads to get Clues, but lately that's been causing the app to crash at times so that you have to restart it. Also, some of the pictures are quite interesting and merit closer study, but as soon as they are revealed they vanish almost instantly.
I love this game and it can be very easy and hard but I love the animals topic and characters I rate it 4 out of 5
Cant finish level as it wont show letters to finish puzzle.... its telephone pole but no o's or n's. Also can't download any free daily pack anymore.

I gave this game three stars because the commercials are way to long. This game should be call 100 minutes of commercials. The game is a lot of fun, but looking at long, boring commercials that they show over and over is the big real challenge!
Excellent game. Makes you think a bit. Support is excellent.

title: Knowledge Trainer: Trivia
description:
Knowledge Trainer: Trivia  is the quiz game for smart people. It‚Äôs designed to stimulate your brain with over 6,000 high-quality, challenging, and informative questions.

2020 marks the 10th anniversary of this sophisticated trivia app. Since 2010, this free game has helped more than 7 million players to improve their general knowledge. Our worldwide team is continuously improving and updating the app.
 
Each trivia lesson tests your wits with 10 questions from 10 different categories. The difficulty level depends on you: get an answer right, you'll move up a level. A wrong answer leads to an easier question. But you'll want to move up to improve your Knowledge Quotient, recalculated after every round.

More app features:
‚Ä¢ 6000+ trivia questions = fewer repeats
‚Ä¢ 5 difficulty levels, 10 general knowledge training categories
‚Ä¢ American, British, Australian & international gameplay modes
‚Ä¢ Quiz questions in 3 languages including French and German 
‚Ä¢ Review function for missed questions
‚Ä¢ Save game progress for 1-3 players
 
Our promise: the smartest, most interesting of all trivia games in the Play Store. But don't take our word for it: check out our user reviews!

title: Sudoku.com - Free Sudoku
description:
Solve sudoku, train your brain, and have fun! Thousands of puzzles to explore. Install to start now!

Classic sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep the mind active ‚Äì pass the time in a pleasant way with sudoku free puzzle game! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head! Take your favorite game with you wherever you go. Sudoku is available offline. Playing the game on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Sudoku.com has 10000+ different puzzles and comes in six difficulty levels: fast, easy, medium, hard, expert and giant one! Play easy sudoku to exercise your brain, logical thinking, and memory, or try medium and hard sudoku to give your mind a real workout.

Our free sudoku puzzle games have some features that make the game easier for you: hints, auto-check, and highlight duplicates. What's more, in our app each classic sudoku puzzle game has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are solving your first puzzle, or you've progressed to expert difficulty. Choose any level you like!

Features:

‚úì Complete Daily Sudoku Challenges to get unique trophies
‚úì Take part in Seasonal Events and win unique medals
‚úì Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
‚úì Turn on Notes ‚úç to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
‚úì Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
‚úì Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features:

- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Color themes. Choose one of three appearances to design your own sudoku kingdom! Play with more comfort, even in the dark!
- Auto-save. If you leave a game unfinished, it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column, and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of the mistakes

Highlights:

‚Ä¢ More than 10000 classic well-formed sudoku puzzles
‚Ä¢ 9x9 grid
‚Ä¢ 6 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty. This free app is suitable for both sudoku beginners and advanced evil sudoku players! Play fast, easy and medium levels to exercise your brain. Choose hard sudoku to improve your skills and try expert or giant game for evil challenges.
‚Ä¢ Support both phones and tablets
‚Ä¢ Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
‚Ä¢ Simple and intuitive design

Daily sudoku is the best way to start your day! 1 or 2 classic sudoku puzzles will help you to wake up, make your brain work, and help you to be ready for a productive working day. Download our mobile application and play sudoku free puzzles offline.

If you are an excellent sudoku solver welcome to our sudoku kingdom!  Here you can spend your free time keeping your mind sharp. Regular game practice will help you become a real sudoku master who quickly deals even with the most difficult web puzzles in a short time.

Challenge your brain anywhere, anytime!

- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Color themes. Choose one of three appearances to design your own sudoku kingdom! Play with more comfort, even in the dark!
- Auto-save. If you leave a game unfinished, it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column, and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of the mistakes

Highlights:

‚Ä¢ More than 10000 classic well-formed sudoku puzzles
‚Ä¢ 9x9 grid
‚Ä¢ 6 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty. This free app is suitable for both sudoku beginners and advanced evil sudoku players! Play fast, easy and medium levels to exercise your brain. Choose hard sudoku to improve your skills and try expert or giant game for evil challenges.
‚Ä¢ Support both phones and tablets
‚Ä¢ Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
‚Ä¢ Simple and intuitive design

Daily sudoku is the best way to start your day! 1 or 2 classic sudoku puzzles will help you to wake up, make your brain work, and help you to be ready for a productive working day. Download our mobile application and play sudoku free puzzles offline.

If you are an excellent sudoku solver welcome to our sudoku kingdom! Here you can spend your free time keeping your mind sharp. Regular game practice will help you become a real sudoku master who quickly deals even with the most difficult web puzzles in a short time.

Challenge your brain anywhere, anytime!

comments: Newest release is ad heavy! Before a game, after a game and now on the score page. Use to have a good ad to game ratio with only 1 add per game. And they dont prove their ads. I've had several that the only way to end them was to switch to another app. Oh well, another game to be removed because someone got greedy. Game play and options are outstanding and if the ads weren't so many I'd still play it.

Best ever Sudoku game I've found! Very intelligent game, specifically that I often miss the square I was aiming for, and this game is smart enough to not count that as a mistake, especially on a bad day. It includes fast games, multiple levels of difficulty, and even a giant puzzle with 16 characters, plus colour schemes for comfort and a variety of ways to input data. I doubt I'll ever look for a different Sudoku game, this offers absolutely everything I could think of!

This app used to be ok. Now it acts like a virus. Starts playing multiple ads by itself...no way to stop that...seems a dangerous app to have. Please do not install it. Thanks for responding. Ads between games is fine. After I click on skip/cross, some other ad starts playing in background while the game is displayed on screen. Happens even while using other apps- if I kill sudoku app the background ad stops. After I uninstalled your app I did not face this problem. Please check.

Good game, but too many adverts, which I accept pay for the game. Some of the adverts go on too long until you can close them, draining the battery of the phone, and there have been a couple where I have had to completely close the game to get past the advert. Apparently all of the adverts are supposed to have the option to close after the first 5 seconds or so. This is the case the majority of the time, but not always.

Excellent interface - great notes function; handy way of removing numbers once you've placed all nine (one should remember, but often does not üòä); error check (bit cheaty, but. ..); clear and easy to see. Don't like the ads, so I'd actually buy this (say a ¬£iver) and give it a 5 star. Thank you.

title: Wood Block Sudoku Game -Classic Free Brain Puzzle
description:
Wood Block Sudoku Game is a Free Sudoku Block Game. It combines the classic block puzzles and sudoku! It is simple to play and fun to keep challenging yourself. Not only can you smash blocks in lines, but also all blocks in 3 by 3 squares. Therefore,  Wood Block Sudoku Game has multiple shapes of blocks for you to fit in!

In Wood Block Sudoku Game, you will find:
üí•Unique Game Experience! Wood Block Sudoku Game is a classic block puzzle game with  whole new rules! The only thing you need to do in this Wood Block Sudoku Game is to clear as many tiles as possible in a 9 by 9 wood board. You can place the given blocks in a horizontal or vertical line in order to clear all of the blocks. In this Wood Block Sudoku Game, you can clear all tiles in 3 by 3 squares as well! And you can bring your wisdom into play to arrange multiple lines and squares to get COMBO SCORE!
üí•A Special Game Rule! We have a game rule in Wood Block Sudoku Game specially just for you! Since blocks can‚Äôt be rotated, it is quite common for players of block puzzle games that they run into a situation easily where given blocks do not fit in any place, and the game is just over. Now we specially designed a box for you to store blocks that you don‚Äôt have a place for. Put them in the box and get new blocks with new shapes! Drag them out when you have room on the board for them! This special box makes block puzzle games easy and fun! Get your highest score with it!
üí•No time limit! Wood Block Sudoku Game provides a pure gaming environment for players! There is no time limit that players can go all out to eliminate as many blocks as possible and get their highest score! 
üí•Multiple Score Mode! Players of Wood Block Sudoku Game will score when they eliminate blocks in a horizontal or vertical line, or a 3 by 3 square. Besides, players can leverage their wisdom to arrange multiple lines and squares to get COMBO SCORE! What‚Äôs better, when players score continuously, they get STREAK SCORE!

Wood Block Sudoku Game is easy to play yet full of challenges! Players have to take advantage of their logical thinking skills to put blocks with different shapes in just the right place. It requires strategy to make decisions. One little step can give the player the highest score trophy or end the whole game! 

Wood Block Sudoku Game is a free, classic and challenging game! You can sharpen your mind and improve your IQ with the Wood Block Sudoku Game! Download Wood Block Sudoku Game and share it with your friends and families. Challenge them with your score record to see if they could beat it! 

Wood Block Sudoku Game is suitable for people of all genders and all ages! Have fun with the Wood Block Sudoku Game! You can play Wood Block Sudoku Game while waiting for your coffee, or while you wait in a line. Wood Block Sudoku Game is offline as well! You can play it anytime or anywhere! 

Playing Wood Block Sudoku Game is addictive! Keep challenging yourself to achieve a higher score! This Wood Block Sudoku Game is also time-consuming! It is not easy to break your own record. But it is fun to make the effort! Adjust your strategy and make the effort!

Download Wood Block Sudoku Game. Get the unique game experience for yourself. Share the Wood Block Sudoku Game with your friends and families! Have fun and exercise your brain with this Wood Block Sudoku Game!

comments: I like the game. Easy to learn, fun to do. As mindless or as challenging as I want it to be. BUT it's developed a problem recently where it doesn't reset at the end of a game. It just goes dark and sits there. Bad stuff. ‚òπÔ∏è
Addictive game, I do find the board too hectic for my brain. All the extra lines üôà
Interesting, always changing and always a challenge.Eady enough to enjoy playing right away but sufficiently difficult to keep you thinking and developing strategies.
Liked it, played every day challenge, but now cannot get any rotation options, always says network error, even when on wifi. Stopped playing cause can't win without being able to rotate

Good game BUT ads. 30 second ad to start a game. 30 second ad to finish a game. If you minimize this game to check texts or phone, another 30 second ad to resume. So a minimum of one minute in ads. I like the daily challenges but on this game I have not figured out what it takes to win a game. It appears that you have to complete a game about 30 times before it counts as completed. It is an good game if you have a lot of spare time and not much else to do.

title: IQ Test Free
description:
Are you ready to test your IQ level with free iq test?
This is an exciting application that has collected interesting tasks on logic, type of thinking and intellectual knowledge.
 
The test was developed on the basis of the well-known Raven IQ test, which he has developed in 1936. He can assess the level of intelligence and the development of logical thinking of a person based on yours answers.
 
This isn‚Äôt an ordinary test, but a whole exciting game. You will be offered 60 pictures with different tasks that you must solve. For greater excitement, this test is passed on time.
And imagine how the adrenaline begins to hit the head when tasks become more complicated and time becomes less and less.
 
Why do you need to know your IQ level?
-this is a free test.
-for general education.
-for fun.
 
Intelligence, as you know, is formed throughout life. And it depends on many factors from reading books to your environment and the amount of communication and information in life.
 
In the modern world, interest in tests has grown. Indeed, they are made clear not only how  clever are people but they are also an interesting pastime. Thanks to this application, a person is distracted from his routine affairs, relaxes and receives his dose of positive.
 
What awaits you inside:
5 blocks of tasks of varying difficulty.
Only 60 different pictures.
The answer to the question: How smart are you.
 
Iq test free is a simple application that will help you spend time fun and very interesting. Let you know how fast your logical thinking works.
 
Test your intelligence!
Unleash the potential of your brain with iq test free.
And, of course, find out your iq level for free.
 
Install the iq test free app and test your intelligence.
Good luck!

title: The Chase ‚Äì Official Free Quiz
description:
Can you beat The Beast? ‚Äì Download The Chase app now!

Finally it's your chance to take on Mark Labbett aka The Beast in the official App of the hit GSN game show The Chase. 

Answer general knowledge questions to build up cash before you face one of the world's finest quiz brains, The Beast. Can you Beat the Beast and get your money back to the prize fund? And can you take him on in the ultimate test of quick-thinking brain power - The Final Chase. 

This isn't just a quiz, it's also a race where you must avoid being caught by The Chaser! How will you fare against The Beast? 

You face a tough challenge, with The Beast accurately modeled on the statistics from his actual performances on the TV show. 

Features:

comments: Other than the game freezing up a couple times, It's a great time killer and a whole lot of fun. It gets alot better once you spend the money and unlock all the questions but it's well worth it.ü§ò

I've been playing the free questions for a few months. Pretty fun! Relatively challenging. Those reviewing saying it's unfair may just not be as good at trivia as they thought. üòâ I'll probably buy the $2.99 all questions pack soon because it's starting to recycle answers and I don't like the advantage. Wish the name function worked though. "Player 1" on my scoreboard is a bummer. üåû

Was entertaining at first but soon became boring and predictable. Game makes it impossible to outrun the "chaser" because trivia questions are tough ones to answer (who in America actually knows which English king won the first Wimbledon tennis match?), you get a limited amount of time to answer the trivia questions and actually score enough to beat the "chaser", and the "chaser" almost ALWAYS gets theirs right. Wouldn't recommend unless you're kin to Albert Einstein or Stephen Hawkins.
Really enjoying the app. It's very much like the show. Wish you could play with other people on their phones though.
I'm a big fan of the show and have learned a lot from watching it. This game follows the show very well. Im having fun. I've already beat the beast once!

title: Art of War 3: PvP RTS modern warfare strategy game
description:
–ê unique classic real-time strategy game with direct control - for true commanders who are not afraid to face the enemy in real-time PvP battles! For those who want to feel the thrill of victory over a real opponent! For those who can think like a strategist and act decisively in any battlefield situation! For those who just want to fight and blow stuff up! It‚Äôs no place for the timid!
Are you ready for the challenge, Commander?
Art of War 3: Global Conflict (AOW) - is a real-time strategy online game in the best tradition of old classic PC RTS games. Command, conquer and defeat your enemy on the battlefield in this modern warfare game! Like other PvP games you may have played, you have to fight against other players in PvP battles, invent new combat tactics, develop your victorious strategies, and upgrade your infantry, assault vehicles, tanks, navy, and air force to reign supreme over the enemy in battle.
The action takes place in the near future. The world is engulfed by a global conflict between two warring factions - the Confederation and the Resistance. Choose your side and fight shoulder to shoulder with other commanders and generals to win this World War. Take the side of the Confederation and protect the world from the red alert. Join the rebels and crush the global domination system. Be a general of your very own strike force.
‚òÖ Epic real-time PvP and cooperative battles.
‚òÖ Thousands of players online from all over the world!
‚òÖ Classic RTS direct control system. You can control each unit directly!
‚òÖ Stunningly detailed 3D graphics will provide you with full immersion.
‚òÖ A variety of units and tactical abilities allow you to invent different victorious strategies.
‚òÖ Two warring factions, each with their own features, unique combat units, strengths, and weaknesses.
‚òÖ –ê large number of unit and building upgrades gives you ample opportunities to create your own unique and victorious army.
‚òÖ Continuous World War in which the clans fight each other for global domination.
‚òÖ –ê huge campaign for each faction, including dozens of hours of game time.
This online, real-time (RTS), modern war strategy game gives you the opportunity to feel like a battlefield general. Command, conquer, build your base, train infantry, produce assault tanks and armored vehicles, warplanes, and warships to defeat the enemy. Take part in the World War. Use superweapons and unleash your power! Join a clan with your friends and fight other factions to dominate the world. Fight to the death andtotally annihilate your enemies!
If you are a fan of pvp games and battle games like the classic rts, then Art of War 3: Global Conflict (AOW) is the game you are looking for! We need you, General!
Art of War 3: Global Conflict is a multiplayer online game. It requires a constant, stable internet connection.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aow3rts
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/GearGamesInc
Discord: https://discord.gg/KVxbxYn
If you have problems while playing the app, or if you want to offer some interesting opinions for improving it, don't hesitate to contact us via aow3@gear-games.com. We look forward to reading your emails to make our games even better and more convenient for players.
descriptionHTML:
–ê unique classic real-time strategy game with direct control - for true commanders who are not afraid to face the enemy in real-time PvP battles! For those who want to feel the thrill of victory over a real opponent! For those who can think like a strategist and act decisively in any battlefield situation! For those who just want to fight and blow stuff up! It‚Äôs no place for the timid!
Are you ready for the challenge, Commander?
Art of War 3: Global Conflict (AOW) - is a real-time strategy online game in the best tradition of old classic PC RTS games. Command, conquer and defeat your enemy on the battlefield in this modern warfare game! Like other PvP games you may have played, you have to fight against other players in PvP battles, invent new combat tactics, develop your victorious strategies, and upgrade your infantry, assault vehicles, tanks, navy, and air force to reign supreme over the enemy in battle.
The action takes place in the near future. The world is engulfed by a global conflict between two warring factions - the Confederation and the Resistance. Choose your side and fight shoulder to shoulder with other commanders and generals to win this World War. Take the side of the Confederation and protect the world from the red alert. Join the rebels and crush the global domination system. Be a general of your very own strike force.
‚òÖ Epic real-time PvP and cooperative battles.
‚òÖ Thousands of players online from all over the world!
‚òÖ Classic RTS direct control system. You can control each unit directly!
‚òÖ Stunningly detailed 3D graphics will provide you with full immersion.
‚òÖ A variety of units and tactical abilities allow you to invent different victorious strategies.
‚òÖ Two warring factions, each with their own features, unique combat units, strengths, and weaknesses.
‚òÖ –ê large number of unit and building upgrades gives you ample opportunities to create your own unique and victorious army.
‚òÖ Continuous World War in which the clans fight each other for global domination.
‚òÖ –ê huge campaign for each faction, including dozens of hours of game time.
This online, real-time (RTS), modern war strategy game gives you the opportunity to feel like a battlefield general. Command, conquer, build your base, train infantry, produce assault tanks and armored vehicles, warplanes, and warships to defeat the enemy. Take part in the World War. Use superweapons and unleash your power! Join a clan with your friends and fight other factions to dominate the world. Fight to the death andtotally annihilate your enemies!
If you are a fan of pvp games and battle games like the classic rts, then Art of War 3: Global Conflict (AOW) is the game you are looking for! We need you, General!
Art of War 3: Global Conflict is a multiplayer online game. It requires a constant, stable internet connection.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aow3rts
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/GearGamesInc
Discord: https://discord.gg/KVxbxYn
If you have problems while playing the app, or if you want to offer some interesting opinions for improving it, don't hesitate to contact us via aow3@gear-games.com. We look forward to reading your emails to make our games even better and more convenient for players.
summary: Build your base, invent your victorious tactic, battle with other players online
developerAddress: 111024, Russia, Moscow, 2nd Entuziastov street, bld. 5/40, Gear Games, Ltd.
recentChanges:
We continue to work on a major update, and in the meantime, we have released a version with minor changes that will make the game more enjoyable.
- Commander Skill table. Now all skills can be viewed in a more convenient way in a table.
- Quick building upgrade menu in battle. Allows you to upgrade all available buildings via separate convenient menu.
comments: Best Way strategy game I would give it 5 stars, if not for this few things I wish the developer would add very soon 1. A way to vote out a clan leader: some leaders can't access their game accounts anymore. So they begin afresh, but resuming their leadership role becomes impossible, so they and clan members are force to abandoned clan cos of inactive leader. Please make it easier to change leaderships in clans to save clans 2. Please include clan battles and gold sharing. Thanks

I like the game but if you could just buy the game and pay for updates i think i would spend money. The way its set up its like a never ending nickle and diming. And whoever pays gets more advantages which isnt really strategic so much as pay to win. Also, i feel like im playing a computer many times even when it says im playing wifth or against another person... i dont know. Also, it doesnt take much strategy for someone to sit in their base and develop a nuke (sPaCe StRiKe) and just blow U up

Great game once you get to level 7 where skirmishes are avaliable this game is a real rts but its not for a casual player as game play is slow do you need time to invest. This is a pay to win and things are expensive but you can also invest time and get the things another (research) production queue would be great devs also but please don't miss out on this game its very good once you get into it. Thanks

Game doesn't load after its open, I am done waiting and unsitalling it right now. I used to love this game a lot but now this issue has killed the vibe, i would appreciate the developer team to fix it as soon as possible. Really want to play it again Just because of this issue i have given it 1 star

The game is good and the graphics also.. but for now i just give a 4 star.. i wish that you can fix a minor problem that i encounter like sometimes the troops dont know where to go when i ordered them.. they just walking to somewhere dead end area.

title: QuizUp
description:
Fun, addictive, challenging, online trivia, that has the best of two worlds.


Sure, you‚Äôve played trivia before. But, have you played a trivia where you can post about your interests on your favorite topic, make your own quiz and connect with millions of users who share your interest, worldwide?

Join millions of players in a brain teaser that combines social network and trivia- QuizUp! 
Learn, grow and have fun challenging friends and players online on interests you‚Äôre best at. 

What‚Äôs more? Play and earn badges that prove you‚Äôre the best in the world at your favorite topic 

QuizUp
Play online while challenging friends or random opponents from around the world in a wide variety of topics ranging from general knowledge, logos, sports, Harry Potter, Disney, action movies, internet, video games and much more, for a nail-biting, quick, real-time match of trivia. 
Climb global ranks and claim fortunes and new title for every topic.

Topic Communities
Participate in a vibrant and engaging community with thousands of topics to choose from and new updates every week. Discover new interests along the way and make your own Quiz too! 
Each quiz topic is set within a category where you can play, post, boast and interact with people who share your interests. Add to that our online tournaments!

Why you will get addicted:
‚Ä¢ Thousands of topics to choose from.
‚Ä¢ Millions of players to play with.
‚Ä¢ Boasting rights to being the best from the rest. (You sweet snowflake!)
‚Ä¢ Meet & compete with new people.
‚Ä¢ The number of Memes.
‚Ä¢ Tournaments Everyday! Prove your mettle.
‚Ä¢ Topic Community.
‚Ä¢ Sudden increase in topics you can talk about. (Yasss! Ice-breaking skills.)

Enjoy QuizUp on the web: http://www.quizup.com
And don‚Äôt forget to follow us:
Twitter: @QuizUp
¬© 2016 Glu Mobile Inc.  All Rights Reserved

summary: Social Trivia Game for all.
recentChanges: Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
comments: I've had quizup downloaded for about a year and have spent half of that trying to open the app. Whenever I click on it, it takes a lot of time to load and ultimately shuts down with the message"Unknown Network error" even though my network connection is perfectly fine. I used to love this game. I hope you solve this problem soon.

I used to love this game but recently whenever I open the app to play it always connects me with a quiz up bot or it does not even connect and sometimes when I open the app it says sorry there is a network error and closes itself and it kind of irritates me please do something about it otherwise I am going to uninstall this app right away so please do something as soon as possible!!!!!!!!!!!!!!.

After selecting ready in a single player game it takes you back to the main menu with no record of the game. Thought it was just a one time fluke but it happened 3 more times. You never know when its going to happen so it's not worth trying for a high score when you could get 20 questions in and it decides to strip the game from you. I used to like this game. Sad.

I've been using this app for the past 5 years now, however recently there have been a lot of issues. Every time I try to connect or play it flashes 'error connecting' or 'unable to load questions'. Even with a stable internet connection. I've uninstalled and installed the app various times, in an endeavour to get rid of this problem but it seems to persist. Please look into the same!

TOO MANY DAMN ADS. I've come back after a while and honestly these awful 'No work but rich' ads are making me quit the game after 5 minutes of playing. I used to play for 2 hours in a day. Now I can't even stand 10 minutes. You got recognition for the game... Remember where you started...

title: Gameloft Classics: 20 Years
description:
Gameloft celebrates its 20th anniversary with a gift for players! Grab hold of the retro fun and blissful nostalgia of 30 iconic Gameloft games, never before available on modern smartphones!

Pop over to Bubble Bash 2 for tropical match-3 puzzles. Lock & load for undead extermination in Zombie Infection. Or maybe you want to seek out your dream love in Date or Ditch 2?

Whatever type of gamer you are, there‚Äôs an unforgettable retro game for you packed inside this great free app!

FEATURES
¬∑ TOTALLY FREE! This is our way to say ‚Äúthank you‚Äù for being with us for the past 20 years.
¬∑ 30 GREAT GAMES, including many of Gameloft‚Äôs biggest hits that defined mobile gaming.
¬∑ THROWBACK GRAPHICS bring old-school gaming nostalgia, but are perfectly reformatted for modern mobile devices.
¬∑ TOUCHSCREEN CONTROLS that let you play with ease.
¬∑ MULTIPLE GAME GENRES, including arcade, action, sports, puzzle, life simulation, card games and more!

**FULL GAME LIST**

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes.
comments: I wish I could give this 5 stars, but the controls are just ported from the physical buttons and it doesn't translate well to touch screens. I have a lot of difficulty playing Block Breaker because I keep hitting a button combination that sends the pad flying to either end of the wall, that combined with the small hit box, makes me miss a lot.

I love this game!!! Its so fun and it gives me energy! But i want something to be added in this game cuz those games in this app is little boring :( I want sport games. Like basketball. Hockey. Football. And castle and base defense game. And more! And i also want a game with full of incredible story! But its hard to find my favourite games in this app. Maybe u can add something like FAVOURITE GAMES BUTTON? And also more incredible brain-struggling question games :D! THANK YOU!!!

I haven't played it yet old games before, but now it seems it was good, not bad at all, some games are not good (I don't personal play it), some games are good (only my favorites). No ads, no pay purchases, and offline (no need internet required online, that's great), it's totally free.

Gave 3 stars because while the games themselves were fun back in the day, it's almost impossible to play them in the format presented here. Games like Brick Breaker, Midnight Bowling, and Midnight Pool are the main ones; the tiny screen you play them on makes it almost impossible to see what's going on. If this game is given the options for touch as well as full screen, I'll change my rating.

I just want to play spiderman unlimited.... That was the BEST GAME EVER. Why the hell did you get rid of it... Please, if you search you will see many people love it... And if it was for profit, then put the game to 4 dollars or something. I would totally buy it without thinking. And many would say the same

title: 60,000+ Important GK Question In Hindi - Offline

This app includes 60,000+GK Question and it also includes thousands of MCQ questions. All Exams GK In Hindi is for all competitive exams like Civil Services, SSC, Bank PO, Railway etc. In this app 60000+ Important objective type questions are being provided. Each topic contains the simple and easy steps of learning something which you feel difficult to remember.

title: Tiny Space Program
description:
This game is in a early release and is updated constantly. Almost every week more content is added. Everything in-game is free. If you like the genre and are willing to help and give some feedback about this game, feel free to try it out!

What would you do if you are a billionaire? owning your own space program, managing, researching and building new space ships, mining on planets and moons, bringing tourist into space for a space walk or just sending researchers to explore what is out there.  

In Tiny Space Program, like modern space companies such as Spacex, Blue origins and Virgin Galactic, you decide/manage what rockets you launch, if you want to bring tourists to Mars and The Moon, or start a mining operation on IO, Titan, Europa or Pluto. You manage and simulate the early colonization of our near future of our interplanetary society and learn what kinds of challenges exists for such an endeavor. 

Features:
- Space Program Manager.
- Building off-world colonies and outposts.
- Launch Space Ships and rockets into orbit.
- Research different technologies,
- Mine resources from stellar bodies,
- Character progression of astronauts
- Spacesuits
- Based on real orbital mechanics and ship propulsion
- Establish Off-world economies

Features ‚Äì to be implemented
- much more rockets and space ships.
- Space stations
- Drones and idle rovers
- Orbital Factories - Capital ships
- Facilitating space colonies
- Colonies to trade with
- Stellar bodies beyond Pluto
- Interstellar Travel. 
- (idle) Trade routes and automation (idle production)

comments: It's a good game. A bit slow at first, but once you establish a few outposts the game moves as fast as you want. I enjoy that the tutorial is brief. Ads only happen if you want to make a bit of in-game cash. I would like to know what an upgrade will get me. "Improved performance" and "more crafting options" doesn't shed much light on what higher level buildings can do. Haven't found uranium yet.

This game is calm and way different from all those moneysucking mobile games. No annoying ads unless you want some extra currency or speed up some progress. It's amazing how much you can do. There's always something new to explore etc. Its only downside is that the gameplay is extremely slow, but it also has its charms: it gives a great feeling of accomplishment at the end of the road. Dear developer, if you see this, just know that i love your work and can't wait to see what comes next.

The game is a work in progress and so it has a few bugs and minor issues which do not affect the overall gameplay experience. This game is not marred by paywalls intrusive pop up ads. All of the content in the game can be enjoyed by players regardless of their budget. It is a difficut game to get the hang of and so a discord group has been created by the developer to assist players in progressing through the game and allowing them to socialize with other players.

Lots of bugs. Lacks instruction. I have everything that is says for Hydroponics (something needed for the game) yet fails to let me make it. Do I need to research something fails to tell me in the game. There is no close button when you open menus in the game. Pressing on top where close button should be works. Fun game too bad it's so clunky. Five out of five if you fix the issues...

It's a fun game and I like the idea but the reason why I'm giving it 3 stars is because of the UI. It jitters when you switch outposts and doesn't register half my taps, meaning you have to press the button twice for it to do something. Developers, if you're reading this, please improve the UI! Make it less jiterry and clunky and I'll up my review to 5 stars.

title: Mind map & note taking tool - MindMeister
description:
Whether you're using it for mind mapping, project planning, brainstorming/idea management, note-taking or presentations, MindMeister can help you organize, prioritize, and even generate new ideas. MindMeister lets you share your mind maps with as many friends or colleagues as you want and collaborate with them in real-time.

Designed from the ground up as an extension to our award-winning, browser-based interface, the MindMeister app stores your mobile creations and seamlessly syncs them with your online account.


Feature highlights:
‚úî Create and edit graphical mind maps
‚úî Seamlessly sync maps and folders with your free online account
‚úî Share maps directly from the device
‚úî Multi-touch support for drag & drop, zoom, pan 
‚úî Add icons, colors, styles, boundaries and map themes
‚úî Edit and view notes, links and tasks on ideas
‚úî Draw connections between topics
‚úî Export as RTF
‚úî Manage Favorites
‚úî Play map-based presentations on your device

Additional features for a paid MindMeister account:
‚úî Export as MindManager, Freemind, PDF, image, MS Word and MS PowerPoint
‚úîUnlimited mind maps
‚úîAttach files and images
‚úîPriority Support

Additional features through www.MindMeister.com interface:
‚úî Unlimited undo/redo
‚úî Import from MindManager, Freemind, Mind and text files

What can you use Mind maps for?
‚úî Idea Management
   - Capture, manage and implement ideas
‚úî Brainstorming
   - Visual real-time brainstorming for teams
‚úî Project Planning
   - Design plans together and put them into reality together
‚úî Note Taking
   - Take meaningful and efficient notes
‚úî Knowledge Management
   - Manage the collective intelligence of your team
‚úî Meeting Management
   - Visualize your agenda, take notes, assign tasks to the persons responsible and work together

NOTE: Requires a free account registration. 


Privacy policy: https://www.mindmeister.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.mindmeister.com/legal

title: Math Tricks
description:
This program is designed for those who want to learn interesting mathematical tricks to speed up the calculating. These tricks will help solve part of the mathematical problems and tasks much faster than classical. Will also be helpful to those who want to hone basics such as the multiplication table. 

When you learn these mathematical tricks, you'll be able to show off your skills to friends and prove to them that you have a talent for mathematics. New skills you can use in the store, at school, at college, at work - wherever thanks to quick calculation skills can save a lot of precious time.

Fun Math Tricks:
1. Addition
2. Subtraction
3. Multiplication table
4. Division
5. Multiply two digit number by 11
6. Square numbers ending in 5
7. Multiply by 5
8. Multiply by 9
9. Multiply by 4
10. Dividing by 5
11. Subtracting from 1000   
12. Tough multiplication   
13. Power of two
14. Adding numbers close to hundreds
15. Subtracting numbers close to hundreds
16. Multiply numbers between 11 and 19
17. Square numbers between 11 and 99
18. Multiply two digit numbers having same tens digit and ones digits add up to ten
19. Square numbers between 50 and 59
20. Square numbers between 40 and 49
21. Multiply two digit numbers editing in 1
22. Percent
23. Square numbers between 100 and 109
...
84. n^9

Training mode: 
- 15 levels for every trick
- timer 15 seconds
Rating stars:
- score > 000 - ‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÜ
- score > 350 - ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ 
- score > 650 - ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

This free version of Math Tricks contains third party advertisements.

The app uses the following APIs and libraries:
* MPAndroidChart - created by Philipp Jahoda
* ColorPIcker - created by Piotr Adamus

Cada sonido tiene tonos binaurales (El sonido binaural es aquel que, siendo grabado mediante el uso de dos micr√≥fonos en una cabeza artificial, intenta crear para el oyente una sensaci√≥n de sonido 3D similar a la de estar f√≠sicamente en la habitaci√≥n o el lugar donde se producen los sonidos.) y ruido blanco detr√°s de ellos que est√°n cient√≠ficamente probados que mejoran la actividad cerebral y la inteligencia.
Las Ondas Cerebrales que consigues con esta app son:

‚Ä¢	Ondas Beta  
‚Ä¢	Ondas Alfa 
‚Ä¢	Ondas Theta
‚Ä¢	Ondas Delta
‚Ä¢	Ondas Gamma

Esta aplicaci√≥n que ha sido creada minuciosamente pretende estimular el control de la mente en los estados m√°s profundos de la conciencia que se abre al mundo subconsciente, donde usted puede crear su realidad a su antojo y con una precisi√≥n exacta. 
Cada frecuencia, medida en ciclos por segundo (Hz), tiene su propio conjunto de caracter√≠sticas que representa un nivel espec√≠fico de la actividad cerebral y por lo tanto un estado √∫nico de la conciencia.

1.	Beta (14-40Hz): las ondas cerebrales beta se asocian con la conciencia normal de vigilia y un mayor estado de alerta, la l√≥gica y el razonamiento cr√≠tico. Al usted realizar sus actividades diarias, usted est√° en Beta. 
 
 
2.	Alfa (7.5-14Hz): las ondas cerebrales Alfa est√°n presentes en una profunda relajaci√≥n con los ojos cerrados y por lo general, mientras se sue√±a despierto. La conciencia individual relajada alcanzada durante la meditaci√≥n de luz es caracter√≠stica de Alfa y es √≥ptima para programar tu mente para el √©xito. 
 
3.	Theta (4-7.5Hz): las ondas cerebrales theta est√°n presentes durante la meditaci√≥n profunda y sue√±o ligero, incluyendo el estado de sue√±o REM. (La fase REM (Rapid Eye Movement en ingl√©s) es la quinta etapa del sue√±o, comienza aproximadamente 90 minutos despu√©s que nos dormimos y se caracteriza por el movimiento acelerado de los ojos. Pero hay mucho m√°s por descubrir acerca de esta fase del sue√±o y esto es lo que vamos a estimular.) Theta es el reino de la mente subconsciente. 
 
 
4.	Delta (0.5-4Hz): La frecuencia Delta es la m√°s lenta y est√° presente en el sue√±o profundo, sin sue√±os y en una meditaci√≥n trascendental muy profunda, donde la conciencia est√° completamente separada. 
 
Delta es el reino de la mente inconsciente. Es la puerta de entrada a la mente universal y el inconsciente colectivo, en donde la informaci√≥n recibida est√° disponible de otro modo en el nivel consciente.
 
Delta se asocia con la curaci√≥n profunda y la regeneraci√≥n, lo que subraya la importancia del sue√±o profundo al proceso de curaci√≥n.
 

 
5.	Gamma (por encima de 40 Hz): El rango m√°s recientemente descubierto es Gamma, que es el m√°s r√°pido en frecuencia, por encima de 40 Hz (algunos investigadores no distinguen las ondas Beta de las Gamma).
 
Aunque se sabe poco de este estado de √°nimo, la investigaci√≥n inicial muestra que las ondas gamma est√°n asociadas con explosiones de perspicacia y de alto nivel de procesamiento de la informaci√≥n.

Activar su cerebro por la meditaci√≥n y a trav√©s de las Ondas Cerebrales ahora es posible y se encuentra a tan solo una descarga de distancia.

No esperes m√°s y descarga Ondas Cerebrales totalmente gratis
‚Ä¢	5 Ondas Cerebrales diferentes
‚Ä¢	No necesitas conexi√≥n a internet 
‚Ä¢	Interfaz F√°cil de usar 
‚Ä¢	Simple y magn√≠fico dise√±o
‚Ä¢	Se recomiendan auriculares
