title: Wordscapes
description:
üíïPlaying Wordscapes 10 mins a day sharpens your mind and prepares you for your daily life and challenges! üíï

This text twist of a word game is tremendous brain challenging fun. Enjoy modern word puzzles with the best of word searching, anagrams, and crosswords! Immerse yourself into the beautiful scenery backgrounds to relax and ease your mind.

Challenge yourself to connect letters and find as many hidden words as you can! Unlock stunning landscape backgrounds to escape from home and relax your brain.

You‚Äôll never experience a dull moment after you try this addicting word puzzle game! Play this crossword puzzle once and just you won‚Äôt be able to put it down. Enjoy word connect and word find games? This is your final destination!

‚ñ∫Escape and relax your brain by visiting the beautiful destinations of Wordscapes!
‚ñ∫ Show your vocabulary power by connecting letters and finding all the hidden words.
‚ñ∫ Get your word hunt on with over 6,000 crossword puzzles!
‚ñ∫ Challenge your brain and vocabulary ‚Äì this crossword puzzle starts easy and becomes challenging fast!
‚ñ∫ Think you can beat these anagram word puzzles? They start simply but ramp up fast!
‚ñ∫ Take each level at your own pace with unlimited tries. Simply fun and relaxation!

Wordscapes is the word hunt game that over 10 million people just can't stop playing! It's a perfect fit for fans of crossword, word connect and word anagram games, combining best of word find games and crossword puzzles. Not to mention all the gorgeous landscapes you can visit to relax yourself!

The top-rated word game, from the makers of Word Stacks, Word Chums, Word Flowers, Word Mocha, Wordscapes Uncrossed, and Spell Blitz.

Terms of service: https://www.peoplefun.com/terms

comments: Fun game, but the tournaments and the teams ruin the whole thing. In order to place high in the tournaments, you have to spend practically entire weekends on the game because of the poor tournament design. It's also impossible to find an active team, but nobody will join a brand new team. The game should hide inactive teams. If the leader hasn't been on in a while, the team should no longer show up. The tournaments should be unique puzzles, not just how fast you can run through levels.

I love this game. However last week it started crashing every time I tried to open it. There were no updates available and I tried restarting my phone and nothing worked. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app because I didn't know what else to try and it works BUT I'M BACK AT LEVEL ONE!!! I have been playing this for years and was at level 1600 something!! Is there any way to restore at least some of the progress I had made??

Was a great game that I'd play every night to pass the time. Then suddenly the game would hang and freeze for no reason. So I uninstalled and installed the app again, only to discover that not only does it continue to hang and freeze, but now I lost all of my coins and helpers. I contacted support through the app a few days ago and still no response from them. Very frustrating.

The game is good. Only problem is that every other game, you get bombarded with adverts. Now I could let this slip by, if the adverts featured weren't the banned ads of Gardenscapes and Fishdom! While every other game has removed those ads, you've left them in. They were banned for a very specific reason, and that is false advertisement, which is a breach of the false advertising standards. When the ads are removed, I will consider upping my rating.

My longest played game. The visuals are soothing, and not too many ads to distract from the play. Mostly you play against yourself, then occasionally you get a tournament if you are feeling competitive. Very few repeated games, and I've played tons of them. The best thing about the game is the soothing photos though. Ty

title: Google Play Books - Ebooks, Audiobooks, and Comics
description:
Google Play Books is the one app you need for enjoying audiobooks and ebooks purchased from Google Play.

Choose from millions of best selling ebooks, comics, textbooks, and audiobooks. Download your book to read or listen on the go. When you‚Äôre finished, find your next favorite from recommendations personalized just for you. Buy audiobooks and ebooks as you go - with no subscription required.

LISTEN TO A GREAT AUDIOBOOK ANYWHERE, ANYTIME
* New! Audiobooks are now available on Google Play
* Buy one or many - no monthly subscription required
* Preview free samples of audiobooks before you buy
* Pick up where you left off on Android, iOS, or on your web browser

MILLIONS OF EBOOKS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
* Preview free samples from our catalog of millions of books
* Read your books, comics, and textbooks on Android, iOS, or your web browser, even when you‚Äôre offline
* Tap the page and watch your favorite comic book or manga come to life with Bubble Zoom
* Take notes that sync with your Google Drive and share them with a group for easy collaboration.
* Use the Night Light setting to automatically adjust the background color and brightness to make it easier for you to fall asleep

comments: I love this app. The Read Aloud function alone is worth the 5 * rating. In terms of research, this has been incredibly useful, I use the storage feature (it saves the highlights and notes to a file on your Google Drive) to go back to what I had previously found important. This is, perhaps, the most important app on my phone. Sure, it has some drawbacks but I am ever-so grateful for the ongoing work on this product.

It is a great app for read books and listen audiobooks. But in the shop section is an disadvantage. I live in Germany and I using a German smartcard, but although my mobile phone is set to English, I only get offers for German books. I have to search specifically for English speaking books, i can't brouse unselfconscious throughout the shop. There are still good offers for English speaking books after all.

I used this app for several years on my android tablet but recently all books in my library and samples are opening in unreadable formats: only a few pages at the beginning show and they are not aligned with the screen. They are cropped so that part of the page is unreadable. The rest of the pages in a book are blank. Google Play Help was useless in fixing this issue.

A very, very good app it does not require money to download and does not require your credit or debit card number for buyin free books the audio for audio books is very good and you can even change the page colours as per your eyes like. I can't even request for refund as I can't track the purchase from anywhere other than my own bank account transaction record. Very much disappointed. Would like to have my money back or never to make any purchase here again.

comments: It's been great, I fall asleep quick just about every night that I use it and I really like the focus tracks but, I wish the binaural music was louder and the voice was softer in the sleep ones. There should be a way to adjust it rather than just music on or off.

It's great that you can pick and choose the sections to unlock and there are good options even without unlocking anything. I have been using the Quick Sleep 32 minute session before bed and it's been great. Even turn it back on if I wake up in the middle of the night and it helps me get back to sleep! üò¥

Fantastic! By far the best brainwave program I've found, You need a good set of headphones to experience it at its best but you will find that it will help with $5 headphones, that's not the case with 99% of brain wave apps. If there's a better app with more selections out there I've never found it, Enjoy!
Great app and in my subjective experience it really seems to work. I was in a bad place and the relaxation and guided meditation really helped turn me around
Works as intended. I love the fact I'm not forced into payment rather test the car before you purchase it. Great app Great content just the best in experience so far(in my opinion)

title: Aptitude Test : Notes, Shortcuts & Practice Set
description:
Quantitative Aptitude app contains Notes ,Tricks & MCQ with solution for all Competitive exams. This "Quantitative Aptitude" app enables you to prepare for most frequently asked Aptitude questions in exams. Aptitude test helps to assess candidate's learning capabilities.

Quantitative Aptitude app or general math have given Quantitative Aptitude Study Material helpful for all exams. 'Aptitude Test and Preparation', Tricks & Practice - the best aptitude app with solutions and short tricks to enhance your aptitude skills and to sharpen your brain. Learn what aptitude tests are, how can you prepare, and practice free online aptitude test or general math/mathematics questions.

This application has inbuilt Aptitude or general math Tips and Tricks, Logical Reasoning Tips and Tricks with Clear and detailed answer and explanation for every question with Daily Practice test. Quantitative Aptitude Study Material or general math/mathematics questions for Competitive Exams Free.

Quantitative Aptitude Tests evaluate numerical ability and problem solving skills of candidates. Aptitude Test Program, Aptitude for Competitive Exams, Comprehensive, point-wise and updated study material. Practice Free Aptitude Questions & Answers Test Series by this app. Learn and practice Aptitude questions and answers with explanation for interview, competitive examination and entrance test from this app.

title: English Grammar Test
description:
Hi! Here is the English Grammar test and tutorial for those who want to start learning English fast and free of charge.
‚òÖ This app covers 5000+ English grammar test questions, using simple explanations, many examples, and fun quizzes.
‚òÖ Whether you are an English language learner, or a native English speaker, this English grammar practice app will help you with the structure of English. By improving your English grammar, your writing and speaking will both improve.

FEATURES
- 2 levels, 20 lessons & over 5000 English grammar questions
- Clear explanations for each answers
- English Grammar practice with many types of questions
- English Grammar test through illustration

title: Wordscapes Search
description:
üíïWould you like to relax, exercise your brain, and expand your vocabulary-all at the same time? With  Wordscapes Search , the NEWEST game from the makers of Wordscapes, you can! These incredibly addicting word search puzzles are brain blasting fun! üíï

Connect letters to find every word on the board and sail through thousands of classic puzzle levels set against stunning nature backgrounds. Training your brain has never been easier ‚Äîor more relaxing. Once you start playing, you just won't be able to put it down!

FEATURES
‚û§Escape and train your brain by visiting the beautiful destinations of  Wordscapes Search !
‚û§CHALLENGE your brain and vocabulary 
‚û§LOTS OF LEVELS. Play 1000‚Äôs of puzzle board levels- with more coming soon
‚û§EARN POWER-UPS. Use boosters to find words when you get stuck
‚û§ COLLECT BONUS POINTS. Find extra words to earn rewards
‚û§ Think you can find every word? These word search puzzles are easy at the start, but get challenging fast!

Wordscapes Search User Reviews:

WORDSCAPES SEARCH IS SO RELAXING 
‚ÄúVery Relaxing! Can‚Äôt stop playing !!‚Äù 
‚ÄúI absolutely love this game! It‚Äôs soothing, relaxing and calming.‚Äù

PLAY TO UNWIND
‚ÄúI love it ......I play for hours. It relaxes me after a hard day‚Äôs work.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis game has helped me so much. When I‚Äôve had a long day this game just makes me forget it. Brilliant game !!‚Äù

BEWARE: IT‚ÄôS ADDICTIVE
‚ÄúReally fun...BEWARE!!! It‚Äôs addictive!!! (in a good way)‚Äù 
‚ÄúI like a good challenge. A great game for keeping the mind sharp. Addicting! You just want to keep playing more‚Äù

PLAY ANYWHERE LEARN EVERYWHERE 
‚ÄúReally nice game to use while waiting for an appointment or just relaxing at home with a warm blanket and coffee.‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat way to kill time at the doctor's office, on the bus, and at the DMV.‚Äù
‚ÄúBeautiful scenery! A calm word search puzzle to help get through the longest check out line!‚Äù

WORDSCAPES SEARCH SHARPENS MY MIND 
‚ÄúIt helps me with vocabulary, spelling, learning, and more!‚Äù
‚Äúit's fun, educational, and it uses your brain to your fullest extent. Great game and great overall experience‚Äù

WHY PLAY?
Calling all brainiacs, quiz whizzes, puzzle pros, and crossword fiends! If you like to relax and unwind with a crossword puzzle, trivia and quiz games, board games, scrabble, or solitaire ‚Äîyou‚Äôll love Wordscapes Search! It‚Äôs easy at first, but gets challenging fast. Can you beat the game? Start playing and find out!

 Wordscapes Search  is a modern twist on classic word search puzzles, combining the best features of crossword, scrabble style, word find, and word connect puzzle games. This BRAND NEW word game is proudly brought to you by PeopleFun, the makers of Wordscapes. Join the PeopleFun family and connect with us!

A bit of trivia‚Ä¶.
Quick quiz! How many words are in the English language? Answer: about 170,000 in current use. And how many words are in the average person‚Äôs vocabulary? Answer: between 20 and 30 thousand. Is your vocabulary above average? Start training your brain and become a word search brainiac: download  Wordscapes Search  and start your word puzzle adventure today! With 1000‚Äôs of puzzle board levels you‚Äôll never be bored!

recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: This game was lots of fun, and my only complaint was the much too frequent adds. However, within the last couple of weeks, the game often freezes up, often in the middle of adjusting my score after a game. Then, I have to shut it down and start over. And, nearly every time it goes to load an ad, it freezes up, as well. Sometimes it simply shuts down by itself. Makes it very frustrating to play, which it never was before. None of the other games by this same company fo this.

I like the game very much! The only thing I hated is the Lazada apps just popped out and blocked my games/takeover the whole game, no matter how I close it; it just keeps coming/doing the interruption. I don't hate ads, but not the one that annoy me, this is the only game I faced this annoying issue! Didn't see in other games I had. Hope these issues can be resolved!

Relaxing after a long day. Keeps my brain rested, yet focused. After playing for awhile, it tires my brain enough so i can sleep well. I wake the next day, feeling sharper, refreshed, and am ready for another long 1. I look forward to playing it, again and again! (Doesn't have many ads in between levels, so that's a bonus+not much lagtime, & 0 purchases necessary to go to as high a level as i want. Very addictive, nice relaxing background graphics+colors, too. I give it 5 stars. üëç)

Great game but holy hell the ads. I don't mind every once in a while like normal games but it's literally after EVERY ROUND. Hard to relax with that. And yes, you can pay for no ads but my point is their placement is such overkill it's super offputting. It also sucks some ads are difficult to click out of because the x to close it is out of the screen view. But i'll still play because it's easy brainless clicking. But the ads are so freaking annoying. So, yeah.

If you like Word Searches, this is for you. It even has nice music! Find the words on the themed list to pass the level. Find all the other small words not on the list, before you finish the list, for extra points. I usually turn off the music on games, but this has delicate, soothing background music, making it nice to play.

title: Joe, brain trainer
description:
Description
Joe, your brain trainer, improves your brain power by exercising your memory, your attention, your concentration, your mental agility, and your well-being in everyday life. Through playful but also cultural exercises, brain training is always a pleasure!

To be played alone or in pairs, this brain training program is suitable for children and adults who want to improve their brain capacity while learning.
24 games are already included in the application:
      - A general knowledge quiz,
      - Chronology of events,
      - Music recognition,
      - A literary discovery game,
      - But also exercises to practice your speed, concentration, memory, ...
A web platform monitoring statistics allows you to review your performance and your challenges.
 

Benefits
These memory exercises are designed to train:
      - Working memory
      - Attention
      - Concentration
      - Speed
      - The establishment of strategies, ...

 
The advantages of the Joe brain training program Stim'Art are:
      - Intelligent games that are appealing and updated every month,
      - Form a social link: challenge your children and play with them from a distance!
      - Customized statistics to track your gains and set your goals!
      - Fun Memory Games,
      - Games that work without wifi,
      - A clinical validation in progress.

 
Stim'Art and science
The Joe Stim'Art program is being clinically validated and tested in a renowned hospital in Paris.
The statistics monitoring platform offers you a tool to monitor and improve your performance.

 
Our awards
DYNSEO was honored many times for itsStim'Art program:
      - Winner of the e-health trophy in 2013
      - Finalist of the European Microsoft App Cup in April 2014
      - Entrepreneur of the Year prize in January 2014
      - Solidarity prize in the Total Edhec Entrepreneurship contest in April 2014
      - Winner of the Bouygues Telecom Start-up Challenge in December 2014
      - Scientip√¥le Initiative Laureate in January 2015
 

Subscription

descriptionHTML:
Description
Joe, your brain trainer, improves your brain power by exercising your memory, your attention, your concentration, your mental agility, and your well-being in everyday life. Through playful but also cultural exercises, brain training is always a pleasure!

To be played alone or in pairs, this brain training program is suitable for children and adults who want to improve their brain capacity while learning.
24 games are already included in the application:
- A general knowledge quiz,
- Chronology of events,
- Music recognition,
- A literary discovery game,
- But also exercises to practice your speed, concentration, memory, ...
A web platform monitoring statistics allows you to review your performance and your challenges.


Benefits
These memory exercises are designed to train:
- Working memory
- Attention
- Concentration
- Speed
- The establishment of strategies, ...


The advantages of the Joe brain training program Stim'Art are:
- Intelligent games that are appealing and updated every month,
- Form a social link: challenge your children and play with them from a distance!
- Customized statistics to track your gains and set your goals!
- Fun Memory Games,
- Games that work without wifi,
- A clinical validation in progress.


Stim'Art and science
The Joe Stim'Art program is being clinically validated and tested in a renowned hospital in Paris.
The statistics monitoring platform offers you a tool to monitor and improve your performance.


Our awards

title: Trivia Quiz Mania - Quiz with Answers
description:
Trivia Quiz Mania app contains 3000+ trivia quizzes for you with no access limit. In this app you can crack and answer the quizzes in different categories such as general knowledge, animal, vehicle, cartoon, geography etc. Each quiz contains four choices for you, and you must crack it and choose the correct answer. You can share the quiz with your friends to test whether they know the correct answer or ask them for help. You can play it with yourself or compete with your friends, classmates to see who can make the correct answer. 


FEATURES

- Tons of trivia quizzes in different categories.
- Fancy user interface for you to answer each quiz easily.
- Share quizzes with friends just by one click.
- Learn more general knowledge with it to boost up your brain power.

comments: Probably the best multiple-choice quiz app out there. Well designed, simple to use, with a plethora of subjects to suit all interests. Just a few things to fix: there are some grammatical errors, some question packs are too short, and a few more subjects would be great. Note to haters: There is the option to buy Trivia Quiz Mania which will remove all ads, which is acceptable.

I would have liked to give more than two stars but the truth is that the people writing these questions did not Mark correct answers as being right. For example the Spruce Goose why is an is a plane and not a boat. These incorrect answers chest made this game completely not fun. If you enjoy getting your correct answers marked wrong, hey play this game and enjoy getting the wrong answers that you know for a fact are correct. Apparently the writers of this game just don't care
Just a great app, lots of fun
Good balance of difficulty.
Okay...then really irritating ads take over the game play. HEY DEVELOPERS..You don't put ads in the middle of game play! DELETED!

title: Imagzle - an image based quiz
description:
Look at the picture and find the solution!
Imagzle is a difficult and fun game based on images. It's going to seriously test you on your cultural background, as well as social, logical and problem solving skills, turning you into a real encyclopedia of miscellaneous facts.

It's one of the best apps to train memory and imagination,
an amazing intellectual challenge with logic riddles, music games, quizzes on history, art, literature and geography, questions about science and technology. 

Can you recognize an exotic animal? Do you know the name of the philosopher with a mustache? What is the instrument with only two strings? On which banknote is a dog represented? What is that strange duck-shaped tool?

The important thing is not to know the answer, but to know how to find it!

There's a lot of trivia to learn by playing alone, but Imagzle is also a perfect game to play in a group: involve friends and relatives, dust off the Encyclop√¶dia Britannica, ask Google and Wikipedia, look for the images, find those who can read a score, look for your ornithologist friend or that cousin with a crash on heraldry in your contacts. The feeling when your brain is working in quest of the solution is wonderfully contagious, so feel free to share it with others!

How to play?
Tap the colored circle, discover the image and find the solution.
If you feel lost, invest in hints and find the right path to the answer.
Each correct answer unlocks new questions and the game grows along with your horizons.

Imagzle is updated every week with new levels and new games,
download the game now.

comments: This game is amazing, I really like how you really have to think about your answers, and not just googling the solutions. I actually learned a couple of things from this game. Like where the inspiration for Frankenstein came from, or the names of some crazy animals like a Trilobite or the Saiga antelope. I just really wanted to say good job! And, I hope you keep making this game even greater.

Best trivia game. It's very enjoyable but can drive you crazy! There are ways around it but I wont give away the game! It's worth the download if you like your knowledge being tested and learn oy ng things you didnt know. There is pretty much no adds. It goes from simple to difficult. And the categories are and number of things. It's not your typical structured trivia game! Its unique and challenging! I love it!
This app is really great. It gets progressively more challenging and I absolutely love it!!!!!!!!!

This game is very abstract and is really simple in design, yet brilliant in its execution. Instead of normal puzzle games where you get stuck and frustrated, you put this game down having learned things you didnt know before! What a great idea, seeking general knowledge should be fun for everyone, to see someone make a game of it deserves some stars, well done!

let me just start with that this is a kinda puzzle game and i highly recommend this game to anyone it is a challenging but fun, it's not something that you just play a couple of levels and put your phone down speaking from personal experience i have had a blast with this game. one of the best mobile games i have ever played. i originally saw this as a youtube ad but there was a part of me that didn't want to skip it what was the plague doctor mask. deserves more than just 5 stars and this review

title: Ultimate English Grammar Test
description:

* Modal verbs, Conditional with Modal Verbs,
* Past Conditional,
* Passive,
* Reported Speech,
* Phrasal Verbs,

* The use of Much and Many, the use of Some, Any, Little, Few, a Few, a Little;

descriptionHTML:

Free ‚ÄúUltimate English Grammar Test‚Äù quizlet game will test your knowledge of complete English grammar:
* Verb tenses (Present Simple Tense, Present Continuous Tense, Present Perfect Tense, Past Simple Tense, Future Simple, Past Continuous Tense, Past Perfect Tense, Present Perfect Continuous, Future Continuous Tense, Future Perfect etc.),
* Zero, First, Second, and Third Conditional
* Modal verbs, Conditional with Modal Verbs,
* Past Conditional,
* Passive,
* Reported Speech,
* Phrasal Verbs,
* Gerund,
* Word order,
* The Comparison of adjectives (comparative, superlative),

* Prepositions (in, at, for, with, on, into, after etc.)
* Articles,
* Possessive and personal pronouns,
* The use of Much and Many, the use of Some, Any, Little, Few, a Few, a Little;

title: Thinking Skills
description:
Thinking Skills are some of the most valuable skills you can learn today. The reason is simple. While in the past, people went to work for their manual skills, today they go to work for their mental skills.
This Application helps you to improve your techniques of thinking, to improve your ability of problem solving in daily life.

We live in an Information Age, no longer an Industrial Age. That‚Äôs why brain has replaced brawn, and strength in thinking has replaced strength in muscles. No matter what kind of business you work for, nor what kind of job you do, today you are expected to apply a range of thinking skills to the work you carry out. 
if you want to achieve wealth, happiness, and professional and person fulfillment, all you have to do is Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life. 
This includes using your judgment; collecting, using, and analyzing information; working with others to solve problems; making decisions on behalf of others; contributing to ideas to innovate and change; and being creative about how your job can function better.
1 What Are Thinking Skills?

1.2 Brain Power 

1.3 Exploding the Myths 

1.4 Brainwork‚Äôs 

1.5 Brain not Brawn

1.8 Key Points

2.4 Confusion 

2.5 Distraction 

2.6 Yo-Yo Thinking

2.7 The Self-Image 

2.8 Positive Re-Framing 

2.9 Expecting the Best 

2.10 Your Brain Wants Success 

2.11 Key Points 

3 Improve Your Memory 

3.1 Synesthesia 

3.2 Landmarks 

3.3 The Peg System 

3.4 Rhymes 

3.5 Mnemonics 

3.6 Remembering People‚Äôs Names 

3.7 Repetition

3.8 Key Points 

4 Blocks to Thinking

4.1 Assumptions

4.3 Thinking and Doing

4.4 Get Rid Of Lazy Thinking Habits

4.5 Think like A Child

4.6 See the Detail As Well As the Big Picture

4.7 Think For Yourself

4.8 Time to Think

4.9 Key Points 

5 Logical Thinking 

5.1 Left-Brain Thinking 

5.2 Right Brain Thinking 

5.3 Managerial Thinking 

5.4 Logical Thinking 

5.5 SMART Goals 

5.6 Systematic Planning 

5.7 Using Information 

5.8 The Limits of Information 

5.9 Key Points 

6 Creative Thinking 

6.1 Think like A Child 

6.2 Be More Curious

6.3 Play with Ideas 

6.4 Make New Connections

6.5 Be A Little Illogical

6.6 Laugh More

6.7 Think Outside Your Limits 

6.8 Key Points 

7 Brainstorming 

7.1 Brainstorming

7.3 An Example of Brainstorming: The Honey Pot 

7.4 Brain writing 

7.5 Key Points 

8 Decision-Taking 

8.1 Time Them

8.3 Balance Them

8.6 Instinct 

8.7 Don‚Äôt Decide Without Acting

9.5 Sleep On It 

9.6 Attack the Problem 

9.7 Two Heads are Better than One 

9.8 Occam‚Äôs Razor and the Five Whys 

9.9 Key Points 

And so on.

title: World at Arms
description:
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖHappy 5th Anniversary!!!‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
Build your army, plan your attack and deploy your forces for an all-out, modern war game that spans the entire world, from the deepest ocean to the skies above!

Battle against the KRA, a rogue army with invasion plans for every nation. Only you and your allies have the power and skills to wipe them out in the exciting Solo Campaign mode. But you can also challenge your friends for fun and glory in the challenging multiplayer mode that truly tests your strategy.

Take advantage of the rich social features to find allies and devise your next cunning strike with the chat feature. Then join or create your own Faction to combine forces and truly become a force to be reckoned with! You can even make your name known on the leaderboards by challenging rivals and skillfully stealing their resources.

FIGHT FOR FREEDOM. FIGHT FOR FREE!
‚àö Enjoy a free world war simulation game with brilliant graphics, stunning animations, and realistic modern military units & buildings.

PROSPER & PROTECT
‚àö Build up your base by constructing and improving facilities that unlock new weapons, technology and tactics.
‚àö Collect resources to fuel your military nation, upgrade facilities, fuse army units and complete numerous achievements to earn free bonuses.

A TRUE WORLD WAR
‚àö Engage in innovative battles across the globe and on various terrains including scorching deserts, urban cityscapes, ocean depths and anywhere else the war spreads.

AWAKEN THE SUPER SOLDIER
‚àö Immerse yourself in the only modern-war strategy game on the market that offers deep-sea exploration and battles!
‚àö Construct the new super unit: Atlas. This immortal war robot is a relic from an ancient nation, but can be the ultimate game-changer in battle!

THE FACTION FACTOR
‚àö Form a Faction with your friends and allies to pool your powers, talk strategy, help each other out, and achieve levels of power that would be all but impossible alone.
‚àö Connect with your friends via Facebook and call for reinforcements from their units during battle.
‚àö Build a Faction Base where you and your allies can build and shared facility that you must all help to protect from invaders. 
‚àö Contribute units to become the invader and strike rival Faction Bases for huge rewards and ultimate bragging rights.

World at Arms is perfect for armchair commanders, fans of military strategy games, modern warfare games, tank games, submarine games and tycoon games, as well as anyone who loves giant robots, cunning tactics, and fighting for domination in a mobile MMO. Download World at Arms for free and enjoy probably the best modern-war strategy game on the market!

Answer interesting questions and learn about Indian economy, Indian political GK, historical places in India, sports trivia, 29 states and its capital cities. Test your history and geography general knowledge with educational India quiz games for kids and adults to play and learn.

India GK Questions And Answers Quiz Test features:

‚úî Two game modes available:

* Endless mode - play for hours as long as you give correct answers to fun trivia quiz questions. The game stops as soon as you provide 3 wrong answers.
* Time mode - each correct answer means additional time and each wrong answers reduces your playing time.

* Multiple choice - choose the correct out of four offered answers;
* Entry - arrange the given letters into the correct order to give the answer;
* Scratch - scratch the picture and type in the correct answer;

comments: I thought, from the description, the game would be about working out the word using a clue and the revealing of the word bit by bit as a last resort using limited hints. Nope. The whole game is about revealing a small amount of a concealed word by tapping on the hint button. That's it. It's all about recognising the top and bottom of the shapes of letters to figure out a word. Last, and not least... A word game with no qwerty keyboard? Really?
Fun game but wish it had qwerty keyboard. I'm not used to this keyboard and spend more time trying to find the letters
Not a bad game but the word exposure needs to be made better and make the keyboard QWERTY!
It took me awhile to catch on but now it's a blast and such a challenge.
NEEDS QWERTY!!!! But it is fun.

title: Woodoku
description:
Woodoku: wood block puzzle games meet a sudoku grid. It‚Äôs a calm but challenging puzzle that you‚Äôll be addicted to in no time!

Place blocks in the 9x9 board and fill rows, columns or squares to clear them from the game. Play for as long as you can without running out of space to beat your high score!

How to Play:

‚ñ° Drag shapes onto the board to place them in the grid.
‚ñ° Fill a row, column, or square to clear blocks from the board.
‚ñ° Clear multiple rows, regions, or squares to earn Combo points!
‚ñ° Clear blocks on every turn to earn Streak points!
‚ñ° Earn as many points as you can to beat your high score!
‚ñ° Have yourself a woody good time!

It‚Äôs a quiet, zen game that‚Äôs easy to learn, but challenging to master! Take your time and take it easy.

Featuring:

‚ñ° Beautiful graphics and satisfying sound effects
‚ñ° A tactile game experience with realistic wood tile design
‚ñ° Relaxing gameplay with no pressure or time limit
‚ñ° A light, small game that won‚Äôt take space on your device
‚ñ° Playable offline so you can enjoy this classic anywhere

comments: Fixed game. Very disappointing! The developer says that the distribution of pieces is random. Bull! After you get to a certain score, you'll never get a diagonal pattern in the initial distribution. Later, if you need pieces going vertically, you're given horizontal ones, if you need one going to the left, you only get pieces to the right. If I had this kind of luck in Vegas, if never go back, but even there they throw you a bone every once in a while! It's not just me, either. My wife and frien

This game is awesome. Super addictive, however, it would be nice if the game didn't deal me the exact opposite of a set if blocks i need. Feels like you're playing against "the house". It's bad enough that i play frequently, and i see the pattern. "Here's the perfect block for you" but you can't use it cuz its rotated or flipped the exact opposite way it's needed. Fix this and i could mindlessly play but it's starting to get boring. 5 star awesome game to keep your mind busy otherwise

Min 8 sec on only 1 or 2 adds before X shows. Then 30 or more on the rest. You need to correct this Fun game. But when the ads last longer than the game itself (after every game) and pop up ads while playing is incredibly STUPID! Takes the enjoyment out of the game. Edit, I am even getting push notifications now. Started right after I made this review!

This is a fun game but you should make it where we can rotate the pieces. Otherwise it's almost impossible to get very far. I'm uninstalling for now and will check back in the future to see if you change that feature. Till then there are other tetris type games that let you rotate.

I think this game would get a lot better if it had the option to store a piece rather than forced to play it. Just one piece like Tetris. Else wise it sets you up to lose. It addicting to try and beat your own score but it'll be frustrating at times.

 The first RPG in trivia games 
- Love brainstorming games? Challenge friends in this amazing quiz app! Duel people from across the world üåé in a challenging quiz battle;

- Test your knowledge in 5 different categories: History, Geography, Art, Sports, and Science. Make your choice;
- World famous geniuses are battling each other in the unique game that allows an engineer üë©üî¨ and an artist üë®üèºüé® to fight and boggle on equal ground
- Develop your character's skills and enhance them with cool items üëë
- Interactive rounds finish duels by spotting the smartest and most precise players üéØ!;
- Boggle with friends and other players about different subjects.

Who's my genius ü§î?
Start playing by choosing one of 15 historical characters who changed the world ‚Äî from Galilei to Queen Victoria. Study and evolve üéì, gain levels üåÄ, upgrade your skills ‚ù§Ô∏è, amaze, become the cleverest among your friends üôèüèº

Intellectual duels ‚Äî may the best win üí™üèª
Are you a millionaire mind, and want a bigger challenge than quizlet or jeopardy? World tour brainstorming with people from across the globe to enjoy trivia. Crack your opponents in the online quiz duel.

However, it's all different in our game ‚Äî it only gets more thrilling when people hit wrong answers on interesting questions, the fight goes on ‚öîÔ∏è.

Group trivia battles: more brains - more fun
Boggle your friends and amaze opponents, fight through a series of quiz rounds with a team of millionaire minds to win in these brainstorming games. Every member has a vote. Try to guess where is the city on the map, try to remember or guess who is the author of the song. Prepare for an unbelievable quest in the world of charades!

Just like in the Millionaire games? No way üôÖüèº
- Jeopardy games is not enough for your genius? Test your knowledge in a true quiz RPG
- You will be amazed by the endless trivia questions in a free quiz game.
- Check your knowledge and get gems for your correct (and even wrong) answers üíé
- Play with friends online. Compete and study at the Academy üèõ

- Not your everyday general knowledge but selected questions only ‚òùüèª
- Akinator can read your mind, can you read the mind of your opponent?
- Keep guessing every day, train your brain and test your skills, boggle will be a piece of cake for you.
- Unleash your knowledge, knowledge is power!

It's not just a quiz, it's a way! The way of the genius ‚õ© üåÖ
Become one of the geniuses! Download this boggle game, free for you and your friends now üì≤

recentChanges:
Level 21 is not the limit. We have added 2 levels ‚Äî and 2 levels of new items in the store too!

comments: The app is good. BUT if you're a woman and you want to change your character you'll be very surprised to see that there are about 13-14 male characters but only 5 or 6 female ones. So not much choice there if you're a woman. The developers should be embarrassed of this.
I often cannot put a point on the world map in geography questions. Tapping several times - no reaction..

12/19: I'm liking everything so far so I'm giving it 5 stars for now. I understand the game is still new so finding opponents might take time. 6/20: What happened? Why does it need to be updated almost everyday? I can't seem to be earning coins now after every game and the $5 section in the Study area is non-existent now.

Good trivia game. I enjoy the battle if wits between people. What ruins the game is you only have 2 energy. If you are playing 2 of 3 match with someone you cannot finish because you run out of energy. If I want to binge play I cannot. If energy was fixed 5 star.
The app hangs up every time. There is no escape button. A lot of questions about Sweden(!?)

title: Internal Organs in 3D (Anatomy)
description:
Shows a three-dimensional model of the human body organs and a description of all of them. 

This application is intended to complement the study of anatomy in medicine, biology or other. 

Touching each organ as the heart, brain, lungs, reproductive system, liver, intestine, ovary, testis, stomach, kidney, etc.. information is displayed. 

Practical, useful and valuable anatomical information in your palm. Reference to primary education, secondary school, college or culture in general. 

features: 
* Supported languages ‚Äã‚ÄãEnglish, French, Portuguese, Spanish. 
* Zoom. 
* Rotate 3D 
* Hide or display the information. 
* Collate between male and female organs. 
* Free Updates. 
* Each anatomical organ is shown in a different color. 
* Descriptions very detailed. 

* Recommended Hardware 
  Processor 1 GHz or more. 
  1 GB of RAM or more. 
  HD screen.

recentChanges:
* 3 animations added.
* New option of floating labels.
* Now you can turn on the Z axis.
* Now you can mute the sounds.

comments: I love the application I love everything about it except for I can't see details and ask questions like what does the lung look like when it's riddled with cancer when it starts in the kidney how do I find out what the kidney looks like after cancers already started in it and so forth. And what if cancer is riddled the entire body bone structure the whole skeleton I would like to see details of that I would like to be able to ask questions and have them answered. I know that's a lot.

I can see clearly how things work now, suggestion... the animation of the lungs isn't clear because it is covered by muscle. Also please show how the circulatory system flows throughout the body. Other than that, great job.

Very less information.... and details, I would give it 5 stars, if you do some work on its anotomy also. like giving cross-section of interal organs and mentioning it's details. It's really very basic app. I think it's for primary school students. It is not at all useful for college students.

It is really helpful for the beginners. My younger brother had learned all the organs so quickly bcoz of this app. I'm very much satisfied with this app. Thnkq so much for making such an amazing app. üòä‚ù£

It's pretty good, but has some obvious things missing: Full system is only viewable for male anatomy. I thought at one point you could overlay outer body so you could see where the organs are, but I can't see it now. The animation for digestion really just shows through the colon, not the whole system. The demarcation between large and small intestine is unclear.. would be nice to be able to see how they interact.

title: Human Anatomy and Physiology: With Illustrations
description:
This app covers all human body parts, organs and systems. It help improve your general knowledge about human body parts and its systems.
If you are looking for a Human Anatomy and Physiology Learning app look no further as this simple Application has been Designed and equipped with vast knowledge about Human Anatomy and Physiology.

This application is designed specifically for Medical Students to help them learn Human Anatomy with ease by using illustrations after a detailed Explanation.

*****APP FEATURES*****
* Easy to use and always FREE!
* Social sharing button to share app contents to your friends.
* You can set all the images as wallpaper, contact info, lock screen and others
* Easy to use
* Zoom in, zoom out, and slide for all images.
* The app works offline. No need to download content.
*Illustration of each biological system that can be zoomed using pinch touch. 
*Description of each element represented.

APP CONTENTS INCLUDE:
*Body Structure and Homeostasis
*Cardio Vascular System 
*Digestive System 
*Nervous System 
*Reproductive System  
*Female Reproductive System 
*Male Reproductive System
*Lymphatic System 
*Muscular System
*Respiratory System 
*Skeletal System 
*Urinary System 
*Anatomy of the Heart, Lung, Brain, Kidney and So on
*Anatomy of Liver, Diaphragm, Spleen, Small Intestine, Pancreas and So on
*Anatomy of the Vagina, Penis, Cervix, Uterus, Testes and so on.

Enjoy Reading :)


***DISCLAIMER***
The contents of this app are for education purpose only. Some of the contents especially illustrated images are obtained from online Resources and remain the Intellectual properties of their respective owners. Any Content can be removed on request by the copyright owner.

title: Tactile Wars
description:
Join players from around the world in a fast-paced, entertaining, and colourful war game!

Become the general of an army of mini-soldier pigments, armed with paint guns! The objective of this strategy arcade game is clear: CONQUER the other players‚Äô territories with colourful blasts of paint!

Choose which colour to join, and it will be your team.
ATTACK the other colours and DEFEND yours!

The TACTICAL possibilities of the game make for EPIC battles: infantry, mines, tanks, turrets, mercenary recruitment, troop upgrades, and alliances with other players are all ways to make your STRATEGY unbeatable!

comments: I like the game enought but has a flaw, the key system, when you finish them i don't understand how ti recharge. This make It very difficult for new players to grow, because without keys you don't erarn coins or xp. I Hope who you make the key system more accessible (like for opening the booty when you don't have keys you must see an advertisement). For the rest the game is beautiful.

In-game currency is garbage takes to long to earn currency. You should be able to receive rewards after every battle not have to use a key to get the rewards. This is basically a pay to win game. The gameplay was alright, but you should not have to re-buy your defenses once you have been attacked. In my opinion this game makes no sense.

Its a great game , i like the controls and the upgrade system is cool but becomes a grind quick , i dislike that everything gets destroyed when it is attacked , lets say the light turret it gets attack boom can not be used , its a cool balancing system to prevent someone from spending no gold but for certain things like vehicles ,turrets , heli towers , tracker groups i wish you could repair them for 1/4 or 1/3 of the original cost. But for other traps and defences like mines ,gysers it breaks

I would have rated it higher, but the key system has to go. It basically turns what is otherwise a beautiful game into a pay to win slot-machine, which is disgusting to me. My advice is to remove the key system immediately or you will lose players.

I love the game it's really fun but the problem is not all of the defenses are in the shop. This means that if u lose them they are gone forever. This is a big problem especially for trackers (squads of troopers that hunt the enemy) because they die a lot. We need the trackers back in the shop. This problem also applies to sniper towers and some other defenses

title: Mnemonics - train your brain
description:
This application will help you learn how to quickly remember:
* large amounts of numerical information
* teaches you how to memorize a deck of playing cards
* improve your ability to concentrate (working capacity) and memory in general.

Mnemonists can remember:
* more than 70 numbers per minute (beginners who have mastered mnemonics - 20 numbers in 2 minutes!)
* a deck of playing cards in less than 30 seconds
* more than 100,000 digits of Pi
* and many more!

Master the working mnemonic system.
Train hard and your memory will amaze everyone, even you - be sure!

title: Brain Exercise - Simple Math Game Puzzles All Ages
description:
We all want to keep our body active, but we don't invest the same amount of efforts and energy for our minds isn't it? Today we have smart phones in our hands which are actually making our brains dumb.
A leading Research has shown that playing brain teasers and mind games helps a great deal in keeping our brain active and increasing its power which helps you in creativity and gives your brain a boost in generating new ideas.

It is a very known fact that physical exercise leads to a longer and healthier life. But, what about the exercise for our brain? Brain Training Math Games app is the solution.

Features of our Simple Math Games App :

.Boost overall brain activity
.Increase your memory power
.Improve brain processing speed
.Reduce boredom
.Improve concentration
.Better productivity

Remember that various brain teasers are important to maximize the benefit we get from working logic puzzles, simple mathematics arithmetic equations like additions and subtractions.
Even if you are not able solve a puzzle, the brain still receives an excellent and much needed workout. Most mind puzzles and brain teasers are being designed for people of all ages. There are lot of benefits and advantages once we start playing brain teasing or puzzle games.
It is a form of treatment for all especially for children who are having mental ability problems or kids with low memory power. Brain Training will help them solve such problems.

 Simple Math Games is a completely free math's app designed to play with ease. 

It can be played in offline mode without the internet connection. It is designed for kids and adults of all ages.

Our Brain Training app is designed in such a way so that you will love Mathematics and be ready to challenge your mind. It will welcome you to the amazing world of numbers. Keep this thing in mind that you are running against time.

Simple Math Games app contains 45 different challenging levels which are divided in 3 different categories such as simple, medium and difficult. Each level has different time limit as per it's level.
Each category has 15 Unique levels to test your brain. You can play any level any numbers of times.
With the use of this app you can enhance your observation skills Mathematical knowledge. 
The app is available in Various other languages such as French, Spanish and German
Also, you can the check the history of your various level so that you can keep a check on your status /progress
We give daily notifications in our app, so that you keep sharpening your brain and increase your productivity.

We are always open for feedback and Suggestions. We would love to hear from you.

So what are you waiting for? Download Free Simple Math Games App right now!

title: IQ TEST FREE- WHAT IS YOUR WISDOM?
description:
Many of us wonder whats my IQ. 
We present you the best IQ tester app with an authentic brain test. Try out the Intelligence score app ‚ÄúIQ Test Free‚Äì What is your Wisdom‚Äù.
IQ test have been in use right since the 19th century for measuring intelligence of individuals. This standardized test has been used across the years by educators and psychologists to foretell a person‚Äôs academic performance and career success, and also to diagnose mental retardation and disabilities in learning. IQ test remains the most commonly used test for judging mental ability. Get the IQ tester app for your mobile.
An intelligence quotient (IQ) is a total score derived from several standardized tests designed to assess human intelligence. Results are adjusted according to the age group.‚Ä®
There are many tests of intelligence.‚Ä®IQ Test Free ‚Äì What is your Wisdom application is based on the Raven IQ test and reminds a logic game for.‚Ä®
The Raven IQ test includes sixty questions. The application has three options - a full intelligence test consisting of 60 questions, a moderate IQ test with 30 questions and a quick test, which is shortened to 15 questions.‚Ä®
The Raven test has been the norm in Great Britain for decades.
The Brain test app provide a free IQ test for everybody and it is suitable for any age, for kids under 15 the free IQ test uses Raven's correction matrices in order to adjust the IQ score and represent reliable results about your brain.
The test time is limited to 40 minutes for the full test, 20 minutes for the intermediate test and 10 minutes for the short test.‚Ä®
The results of the test - the IQ distribution usually produces a bell graph similar to a normal distribution. 
The average IQ is 100.‚Ä® The highest score is 175 , in this case you can be clarified a genius and the lowest is 25, in case results are around this number, the test is called also a stupid test or the dumb test. I just found out whats my IQ score, find yours. :D
The result brain test score is described verbally, rather than displayed on an IQ graph, which is intended to amuse the users more than graphics results.
Only the results of the full test are reliable. Short-term tests were created for people who do not want to spend 40 minutes and yet to be tested. At these points, it is important to take into account that the grade received is inaccurate and unreliable.
Raven‚Äôs Progressive Matrices and Mill Hill Vocabulary Scales were developed for use in fundamental research into the genetic and environmental determinants of ‚Äò‚Äòintelligence.‚Äô‚Äô‚Ä®
The Raven Progressive Matrices (RPM) intelligence tests (of which there are several versions) are made up of a series of diagrams or designs with a part missing.
Those taking the tests are expected to select the correct part to complete the designs from a number of options printed beneath.‚Ä®
Most of the tests in this app was conducted with the Standard Progressive Matrices Test.‚Ä®
Scores are converted into age adjusted IQ according to Raven's Matrices.‚Ä®
The IQ tester app provides option to make selfie and entering your name before sharing results with friends. Brag in front of your friends sharing status of ‚ÄúWhats my IQ‚Äù.
What are your waiting for, Download the best IQ Tester app ‚ÄúIQ Test Free ‚Äì What is your Wisdom‚Äù?

title: Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare
description:
Step into the next generation of MMO strategy in Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare. Train your troops, build your base and command an army against your enemies. Conquer Black Sites and outposts full of resources, and team up with friends to take total control of the battlefield!

The year is 2037, and the evil Phoenix Corporation has taken control of Selva De Fuego - the world‚Äôs only source of a new lifesaving serum. The world has declared war on Phoenix, giving every private military and mercenary force a green light to invade Selva De Fuego and do whatever it takes to crush the rogue corporation.

This where you come in. As the commander of a division of seasoned soldiers of fortune, your mission is to defeat Phoenix before your rivals - but it won‚Äôt be easy. Standing between you and victory are the most elite mercenaries and devastating weapons on the modern battlefield.

Use a cutting-edge arsenal of weapons including advanced assault vehicles, tanks and futuristic military drones to prepare for all-out warfare in the mobile sequel to the award-winning hit Soldiers Inc.‚Ñ¢.

Game Features

comments: This isn't a "game", so much as it's a chat room, designed to psychologically manipulate you into spending money on it. In fact, prices for offer bundles will go UP if you buy them. Very addicting!!! i can't stop playing it on my PC with Bluestacks app!!! Soon i will get a phone and enjoy it even more. comments: So over all it is a very good learning experience. The courses are planned wel and it seems that the developers put a large amount of work into this. But as a subscription app that is not that cheap. I has some very frustrating bugs. In the Dutch course you don't have the char ' that is very important for spelling and there is no way around it. And the speaking practice is really bad sometimes that I have gave up using it in the last 2 months. Without those few bugs I would give it 5/5

I had a weird issue to where it wouldn't let me log in saying "Try again later". I uninstalled the app and reinstalled it, it seems to have done the trick. I hope this isn't a recurring issue with the app apart from the voice recognition that others were talking about. It's kind of funny what it thinks you say. It thought I said "Skin store" instead of "Stimmt so". I'll use the other options of reviewing German until voice recognition is fixed. Others should do the same to save any frustration.

This is an awsome app! You are able to learn any language, and you are able to choose if you wanna talk or not, it also tells you if tou should start learning again, or when another level is unlocked! Again like I said the best app ever, I have learned both Spanish and French with this app!

FIXED!!! App doesn't sync lessons completed on the browser. The app itself is great and I've already learnt a lot more in a short time in comparison to other apps because Babbel mixes different topics so it's not boring. That was the thing that slowed my progress before. This app has realistic conversations so you get used to actual language, not just repeating isolated phrases like "Brot und Wasser" twenty times like a drill exercise.

Great app but the lessons are too long and sometimes have 2 halves that are seemingly unrelated. Today I learned about trying on clothes and numbers by the hundred. If these had been 2 seperate lessons in the same course, I wouldn't have minded. But it takes so long to do them at the same time and I can't save my progress. Please either split up the lessons or add an ability to save position in a lesson

title: Riddles - 500 Brain Yoga

With hundreds of free rebus puzzles, riddles and brain teasers, this entertaining game is as exciting as it gets. Solve all kinds of riddles and puzzles from funny riddles to logical ones. These cleverly structured riddles will make your brain work to find solutions that aren‚Äôt readily available.

On the " Riddles ‚Äì 500 Brain Yoga" app, you will find collection of free riddles, puzzles and brain teasers asked in a very user-friendly fashion. title: IQ Test
description:
General intelligence is a key to determining many life outcomes such as academic success, job performance and advancement.
IQ tests measure your ability to understand ideas and not the quantity of your knowledge so learning new information does not automatically increase your IQ. There is evidence that maintaining an intellectually stimulating environment (by learning new skills) and some forms of specialized brain training boosts some ability but these changes aren't permanent.
The free IQ Test application helps you to do exactly that, as well as gain some insight to your cognitive abilities and arouse your brain.  
* Features: There are 2 modes:
- Mode 1:
- You play as a game with individual quiz for your answer and checking. This mode is limited by default 5 lives after 15minutes as an interval. 
+ A correct answer, you will get 10 grades.
+ An incorrect answer, you will lose 1 live.  Anyway, you can exchange your grade to get the lives if you have grades enough.
- During your playing, you can get hint for the quiz which depends on the quiz data
- You can share your grade and check your rank with other player in the world.
- Mode 2: 
You can join a full test with 40 quizzes in 60 minutes. After the Test, you can get and share your certification (just certification of this application ;)) to Facebook or G+ if you like.
Others,
-	The database of quizzes is going to update daily. 
-	The quizzes resource is collected from professional IQ book.
-	There is no repeat quiz if you have answered it yet.
-	This app can support content of quizzes in English and Vietnamese (only).
Hope you practice well and become a Genius!

title: Bible Trivia
description:
Bible Trivia is made to test your knowledge of bible and learn more about Christianity in a fun way. If you like fun quizzes on religions, this is a perfect past time app for you! A variety of Bible trivia questions - guess the quote, name Christian saints, answer questions about psalms and proverbs, hymns and so much more. What are the ten commandments of God? How many books of Moses are there? Who were Samson and Delilah? What is the story of Noah and the Ark? Download Bible quiz questions and answers for kids and adults and test your knowledge right now! Find out how much you really remember all the biblical stories and test your memory with this fascinating mind game.

Understanding the Bible scriptures is essential for every religious person. For some, this is the impossible quiz challenge! The most interesting Christian quiz on The Holy Bible Old and New testaments are now at the palm of your hand! Interesting and intelligent questions and answers will help you learn all the important facts about Christianity. Gain knowledge on the largest of religions of the world with new Bible quiz - religious game for everyone. Smart quizzes are an excellent way to improve your general knowledge and IQ - get some real brain training and educate yourself! You don't even have to be online to play - download the intelligent Bible trivia quiz app and then play without internet any time you want! Get this smart app for free to check how much you really remember your church reading.

Bible quiz a good way to grow faith and have fun at the same time through interesting quiz games. Challenge your way through trivia questions developed to start easy and get so difficult that even the most knowledgeable Bible scholars will be challenged by the final level questions in the game. It‚Äôs great for Sunday School use, too, because you can play a bit free, every day.  Christian scholars rely upon knowledge to understand God‚Äôs plan for mankind, where Jesus is the way, truth and the life. Whether you are a Christian or not, you will enjoy learning while playing this Jeopardy! like game. And it‚Äôs great for kids, too.

How well do you know your Bible? But perhaps, the best question is, do you have what it takes to know Jesus and His word through learning, the more you play? Play to learn more about the key pillars of Christianity and the faith by playing through the Word of God. Whether the Creation, Adam & Eve, Moses, the Exodus, Noah‚Äôs Ark, The Story of Joseph, Abraham & Isaac, Samson, Ruth, Esther, Nehemiah, King David and so many other Old Testament texts, or New Testament content about the life of Jesus, new wine or if you just want a quality Christian game, this Jeopardy! type of game is right for you.

There are 8 game modes available. Solve the words by the Guess The Word game mode, answer the True Or False facts, or choose one of the regular game mode to answer New Testament, Old Testament or Basic Questions. You can also check how many questions you can answer within 5 minutes or compete with others to become Today's Champion, or learn through Divine Mode.

Features:
1.	 Easy and quick to play
2.	 Challenging and interesting
3.	 Free to play for all generations
4.	 Amazing graphics and animations
5.	 Gain extra bonus
6.	 Keep a track of your stats and progress
7.	 Share with friends
8.	 8 game modes available
9.	 Check your history
10.	 True or False
11.	 Time limited as well as unlimited mode
12.	 Play without internet connection.
13.	 Show result if you have answered it right or wrong!
14.	 Calculation of your scores at the end of each quiz.
15.	 Best user interface.
16.	 Easy to use.

We hope, you will like the great efforts of our developers and designs and will share this biblical game with your friends and family. If you have suggestion or feedback then let us know as it‚Äôs important for us. Be happy and enjoy, GOD BLESS YOU!!

comments: Great app. It really raises your level of understanding details in the Bible. There are several different platforms from which to select (fill in the word, true/false, word choice, etc.). Challenges are about people, places, verses, books, and occurrences. The game keeps me coming back for more.

I am thoroughly enjoying this app. It's challenging my memory and knowledge of God's Word and that's always a good thing. I'm going to suggest that a "pause" button be added. You can't always take time for a game without interruptions. Also, I'm asking them to check on a couple of questions are cut off before completion.
The game is wonderfull. It has deffenately allowed me to know how much I still have to learn, and has open my eyes to many things in the Word. Greatly appreciate the game and the chllenge.

Excellent game to feed your spirit with God's truth. When you answer wrong I appreciate the feature to search in the scriptures the correct answers. I don't play online games but this is an exception for me.
It's a good app. Although, it would be better if they provided more detail on the answers, especially giving the right answer so you can learn as you play.

title: Human body General Questions
description:
In this app, there are 700 facts and general questions of human body.
All the content in this app is in hindi language.
Facts are arranged in sections.
Users can read content section by section.

Some of the facts of human body which this app has:
The only part of the body that has no blood supply is the cornea of the eye. It receives oxygen directly from the air.
The human brain has a memory capacity which is the equivalent of more than four terabytes on a hard drive.
A newborn child can breathe and swallow at the same time for up to seven months.
Your skull is made up of 29 different bones.

title: Brain Puzzle
description:
Treat yourself to a free, fun and unbelievably addictive brain workout! Our Puzzle Bundle is designed to put your logic, memory and wit to the test through a series of free mini challenges. The mind teasers we have for you will strengthen your mind and keep it always sharp.

Even kids love it! This brain puzzles help improving children‚Äôs mind, memory and logic skills, without even trying! With its cute graphics, the game can win you as a loyal fan, as it does to its all-million mobile user from all over the world!  

Try this brain teaser challenge and share with friends: ask friends for help about a user solution, brag about your great mind power or just share to the ones you know will enjoy it. 

You don't need advanced apparatus or contraptions to play the test - just your mobile phone and your brain. 

Here is how to play it: 

You start with a few unlocked puzzles.  
The faster you solve them, the more Zold you‚Äôll get. 
The more Zold you get, the more unlocked puzzles you will have. 
Simple yet challenging, right? 

If you desire to improve your brain performance and make a perfect score or just for fun, you are able to replay a puzzle, for free, as many time as you want!  

This game first release launched at #1 in UK!!! Great brainiacs there! How about your country? Not to worry, the game is translated in German, French, Italian, Spanish, Korean, Chinese and Russian. So, wherever you are from, go for it and prove your country as the best brainiacs ever! 

What others say for us? 

‚ÄúShould you Download Brain Puzzle FREE? Brain Puzzle FREE is a genuinely excellent game that is fun to play and very well crafted. If you enjoy puzzle games of all kinds, be sure to check this out. It‚Äôs rewarding, addictive and above all, fun.‚Äù (‚òÖ4.5/5) 
‚Äî AndroidTapp 
‚ÄúBrain Puzzle is a simple app that focuses on delivering highly challenging puzzles. According to the developers, users with high levels of dexterity, wit, and logical thinking are the ones who will be more successful in overcoming these mind challenges. The puzzles are unique and pretty much original, so don‚Äôt expect too much puzzle rehashes from other similar apps. Some puzzles will require you to find hidden stuff, solve riddles by determining patterns, connect the dots, and even match images.‚Äù (‚òÖ4/5) 
‚Äî AppsPirate 
‚ÄúBran Puzzle Free is a fun puzzle game for Android that includes several different types of games. These games grow in difficulty and present many games that test your logic skills, your memory and observation. Overall, this game is one of those games you are always thankful to have installed, because it's the perfect time waster without being a nonsense game.‚Äù (‚òÖ4.5/5) 
‚Äî AppsZoom 

Are you smart enough? 
Do you have the skills? 
Do you dare? 
Put your brain on the fun fire! 

We at Bytewaves would like to express our gratitude to all of our fans and supporters! If you like our game, please, rate it in the App Store! Thank you! 

We would like to stay loyal to our customers, so we want to warn you that the game may not run with its full capacity on older devices with less memory and old fashioned hardware. If you have any problems with the game, don't hesitate to write us at: support@amnesiapps.com. Please, include your device type and firmware version.

title: General Medical Quiz On Human Anatomy
descriptionHTML:
Here is a new quiz game for all medical lovers! If you are obsessed with everything connected to medicine and human anatomy and physiology, you should take the latest üíä' General Medical Quiz On Human Anatomy 'üíä! Put your knowledge to the test and see exactly how much you know about human body, human organ systems, medical terminology, diseases and symptoms and other medical general knowledge. Answer the best medical quiz questions and see if you can pass this anatomy and physiology brain test quiz! Do you know how is called the soft spot on top of an infants head? If you do, then accept this quiz challenge game and solve both easy and difficult medical trivia questions. If you are interested in different medical fields of study such as neurology, cardiology, ophthalmology, pathology, pediatrics and many more, try this medical and health trivia questions. And see how good is your medical knowledge!

üìã 5 levels of difficulty in the endless quiz questions and answers;
üöë Play üíä General Medical Quiz On Human Anatomy üíä, choose one of 4 offered answers and do it fast, the clock is ticking;
üöë Give the answer quickly and win extra points for being fast;
üöë Be careful not to make three errors in a row or else you'll have to start over;
üìã Use one of 3 available helps to solve the questions:
üíâ 50:50 ‚Äì remove two incorrect answers;
üíâ Switch your question with another one;
üíâ Use the help of your friends ‚Äì take a look at their answers shown in percent.

Are you cut out for medical school? This is the question that many people ask themselves especially high school students when they think about colleges. So don't think so much and find out if you can pass this medical quiz first. Download üíä General Medical Quiz On Human Anatomy üíä and test your understanding of human organ systems like respiratory, nervous, skeletal, muscle, endocrine and other organ systems. This is the perfect medical quiz for high school students, medical students, nurses, doctors and surgeons. Even doctors and general practitioners should refresh their memory by taking advanced medical terminology quiz. Take this medical GK game and learn what our bodies are made of and how they work. It's an awesome educational quiz game which can prepare you for your anatomy and physiology exam. Use this medical study app for medical students and get ready for your entrance medical exam. Practice with this general knowledge quiz for medical admission which you can use as medical study notes. Pass all your medical tests and exams with the help of this medical science quiz game offline!

Are you hooked on medical drama series like ER, General Hospital and you cannot wait for new episodes of Grey's Anatomy? If you are really into medical TV shows, then you will be also into this free medical trivia game! Get this üíä General Medical Quiz On Human Anatomy üíä and give answers to these health and medical questions! See if you know all medical terms and can you guess the names of all external and internal organs. Test your knowledge on bones and muscles anatomy as well as cells and tissues. What is a medical name for a nose job? What medications are used to manage localized allergic reactions? Train your brain and answer these medical surgical nursing questions. Solve this medical terminology quiz app free about human anatomy and physiology. Have fun and acquire new information about medication side effects, diagnosis and treatment of diseases, and some fun medical trivia facts about MRI and CT scans. It's an interesting science game for adults and educational game for girls, boys and everyone who is fascinated by the study of health and medicine. So don't waste more time and start solving these human physiology questions!
summary: Challenge yourself with this general medicine and medical terminology quiz game!

title: Sudoku - Free Classic Sudoku Puzzles
description:
üëçSudoku Free Puzzle Game is a welcomed and addictive Brain Sudoku puzzle game on Google Play. You can download Sudoku free app for your  Android phone and tablet. You get  5000+ challenging Sudoku puzzles everyday to train your brain, and we add 100 new sudoku puzzles every week. Brain Sudoku for beginners and advanced players! üí™Each Sudoku has only one true solution. Classic Sudoku the puzzle game for your brain, logical thinking, memory, and A GOOD TIME KILLER!

Classic Sudoku is a logic-based number puzzle game and the goal is to place 1 to 9 digit numbers into each grid cell so that each number can only appear once in each row, each column and each mini-grid. With our Sudoku puzzle app, you can not only enjoy sudoku games anytime anywhere, but also learn Sudoku techniques from it. 

Key Features
‚úìüí™Sudoku puzzles come in 4 difficulty levels - easy Sudoku, medium Sudoku, hard Sudoku and expert Sudoku! Perfect for Sudoku beginners and advanced players!
‚úìüí™Daily Challenges - Complete Daily Challenges and collect trophies. 
‚úìüí™Pencil Mode - Turn on/ off pencil mode as you like.
‚úìüí™Highlight Duplicates - to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block.
‚úìüí™Intelligent Hints - guide you through the numbers when you get stuck
‚úìüí™Themes - Choose the theme that makes it easier for your eyes.
‚úìüí™Long press to fill quickly


On this Brain Sudoku free app, you are also able to
‚úìüí™Turn on/ off sound effects
‚úìüí™Turn on/ off Highlight identical numbers
‚úìüí™Auto remove notes from all columns, rows and blocks once the number is placed
‚úìüí™Unlimited undo & redo
‚úìüí™Auto-save - Pause the game and resume the game without losing any progress
‚úìüí™Sudoku online & Sudoku offline

You may also find the following Brain Sudoku features useful
‚úìüí™You can share to your friends via Google+, Facebook, Twitter etc..
‚úìüí™Use dark mode to protect your eyes
‚úìüí™Turn on/ off timer when you play the sudoku puzzle
‚úìüí™100 new sudoku puzzles every week.
‚úìüí™New types of Sudoku puzzles, like Killer sudoku, letter Sudoku, will be available.
‚úìüí™Good gameplay
‚úìüí™Intuitive interface
‚úìüí™Easy tools, easy control
‚úìüí™Clear layout


Our free Sudoku puzzle app has intuitive interface, easy control, clear layout and well balanced difficulty levels for beginners and advanced players. It‚Äôs not only a good time killer but also helps you think, makes you more logical and have better memory. 

When you first open our Sudoku app, you see a guide tour teaching you how to play Sudoku and when you open the puzzle game app for the 100th time, you can see yourself a Sudoku master and a great Sudoku solver. You‚Äôd be able to play any web sudoku fast. Come to our Kingdom of Sudoku and keep your mind sharp.

This is the sodoku app for sodoku lovers. If you like to play soduku game, you should download the suduku game app. We offer 4 difficulty levels. We add 100 new sedoku puzzles every week. Download now and play sudoko everyday.

If you have any idea for our Sudoku puzzle game app, or if you have any question about Sudoku and you want to discuss with us, please send us emails at support@dailyinnovation.biz We are always here for you.

title: Brain and Cognitive Fitness
description:
Personalized workouts for cognitive fitness and brain health. Download BodBot and start today!

Exercise is a powerful tool for enhancing mental performance and cognitive health. Whether you want to improve your general brain health and memory[1][2], enhance your problem solving abilities[3], reduce your risk of Parkinson‚Äôs or Alzheimer‚Äôs[4][5][6][7], or bend metal and shoot lasers with your mind ‚Äì exercise has an important role to play in all but two of those activities. In particular, richer fitness regimens ‚Äì regimens consisting of aerobic and resistance training methods[8][1], produce the greatest overall improvements in cognitive performance and neurochemical brain processes. Note, however, working out for sixteen hours each day won‚Äôt turn you into the next Stephen Hawking. There are diminishing returns[9], and the favorable cerebral environment promoted by exercise is only as good as the active learning that accompanies it.

In the same way that exercise has been found to improve a wide range of general health conditions[15][16][17][18][19][20][21], so too does it have wide and positive impacts across the brain. Its effects extend across vascular[22][23], metabolic[24][25], inflammatory[26] [24] and stress-regulating[27] pathways as they exist in the brain. Exercise has been shown to enhance neuronal metabolic and mitochondrial functioning[28][25], decrease oxidative stress in the hippocampus[29][27], and increase mitochondrial machinery[28]. Another way of saying this: working out helps improve the power supply, the work environment and workers themselves in neuronal ‚Äòtrain stations.‚Äô On the other end, stress, and chronic stress in particular, has been linked to impaired functioning of, and indeed damage to, the hippocampus[27]. Exercise has shown favorable benefits in the regulation of stress (and in particular the management of corticosteroid processes ‚Äì e.g. cortisol)[27], and may also favorably affect hippocampal memory systems through this process (also potentially leading to improvements in mood and attention if not intelligence). 

More specific to the process of memory formation and the underlying neuronal structure, exercise has been found to increase levels of hippocampal neurotrophins[32]. Neurotrophins are a class of growth factors centrally important in the development and health of neurons[33]. In particular, increases in a neurotrophin called brain derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF) have been linked to neurogenesis (the creation of new neurons) and improved synaptic plasticity[32][24] [34], producing substantial improvements in memory[24]. In turn, exercise has been found to up-regulate levels of hippocampal BDNF[34]- and much of its impact on memory appears to stem from this process[35]. To make a wild analogy and a gross, but potentially useful, simplification ‚Äì BDNF is to neurogenesis as testosterone is to muscle growth. 

Insulin like growth factor 1 (IGF1) is another compound which has been found to enhance neurogenesis and plasticity processes[36][37], and it is similarly upregulated through working out[38][39][40]. Not only does strenuous physical activity lead to positive increases in these compounds, but it can also help regulate hormones which indirectly support them. Active fitness workouts have been shown to help maintain levels of testosterone and estrogen[41][42], which have also been shown to help favorably regulate levels of neurotrophins and neurogenesis [43][44][45][41]. Taken together, the neuronal and synaptic plasticity promoted by these compounds ultimately work to facilitate some of the basic processes of cognition, learning and memory formation such as Long Term Potentiation, or ‚ÄòLTP. Exercise appears to have has favorable effects on LTP [46][47][48], most likely mediated by its positive effects on synaptic plasticity generally.

To see more on how physical activity impacts cognitive fitness, mood, attention and intelligence see http://www.bodbot.com/Cognitive_Health.html
